Product Name: Vanshades VW T5 T6  Campervan Window Pod B - Nearside Sliding Door (After Market - Fixed or Sliding window)
Product Description:
Vanshades VW T5 T6 Window Pod B - Nearside Sliding Door (After Market - Fixed or Sliding window)

The Vanshades Window Pod® thermal insulated blackout blind system is a stylish and practical addition to your VW Transporter T5 & T6 campervan, whether you're just starting up or looking to retro fit, the Vanshades Window Pod® blinds are the ideal solution to get you on your way.

Vanshades T5 & T6 Campervan Window Pod® comes pre-assembled with blackout and thermal blinds. Designed for exact positioning within a VW T5 & T6 campervan and ready for a quick and easy install, the Window Pod® blinds are available in multiple colours and comes pre-lined in Hi-Flex Smoke Velour Carpet for new and existing campervan conversions.

The Window Pod® system is available in various options to fit alongside fixed, aftermarket and OEM sliding windows inside your VW T5 & T6 Transporter Campervan.

Window Pod B is specifically designed to be installed on the Near Side (passenger side) sliding door and compatible to both fixed and sliding aftermarket bonded windows.

Available Blind Options

  • Slate
  • Raven

Easy to install and Stylish

Vanshades Window Pod® comes pre-assembled and pre-lined ready for a quick install into your VW T5 & T6 campervan and has no visible fixings.

Window Pod® Thermal & Blackout Blinds!

Vanshades Window Pod® system has been designed specifically with your comfort and privacy in mind, with thermal and blackout features helping to keep you cool in the summer and warm in the winter whilst also maintaining a stylish and modern look throughout your T5 & T6 campervan!

Features:

  •     Foil lined honeycomb design
  •     Pre lined in Smoke Velour Carpet
  •     Retains heat in winter
  •     Helps to keep you cooler in the summer
  •     Reduces condensation
  •     Provides a thermal barrier
  •     Blackout as standard
  •     Reduces noise pollution in your campervan

Product Name: Adventurer Removable Battery For Portable Compressor Fridges
Product Description:
Alpicool Adventurer Removable Camping Fridge Battery

Use your mobile camping fridge when away from power 

Whether you need a back up for times off grid, want to take your fridge on the beach picnic or enjoy chilled snacks and drinks on the camp field, this removable camping fridge battery from Alpicool helps extend the operating time of your fridge.

Compatible with multiple fridges in the Alpicool Adventurer range

This removable battery can be used with a selection of Alpicool Adventurer portable fridges including the EP22, ENX and CF Range to name but a few. The full list of compatible fridges is listed below. 

Easy Charging

When inserted into a compatible fridge, this battery can be charged from 12v DC or 230v AC power. With a simple single button for powering on and off and a useful charging indicator, operating this battery is easy and hassle-free. 

Alpicool Adventurer FSAK-002 portable fridge removable battery:

  • Input voltage 12.6v/3A (DC input)
  • Output 10A Max
  • Battery Capacity: 15600mAh
  • Rated to keep a 50L fridge at 5°C for up to 20 hours with an ambient temperature of 20°C
  • Clear indicator LED
  • Compatible with the following fridge models
    • AD-EP22/EP22
    • ADCF15/CF15
    • ADENX42/52/62 - ENX42/52/62
    • AD-TA35/45/55
    • AD-TSW80/100
Category: Fridges & Coolboxes/Cool Boxes;Fridges & Coolboxes/Cool Boxes/Compressor Fridge & Freezer;Caravan, Campervan & Motorhome

Product Name: Alpicool Adventurer Portable Solar Panels for Portable Compressor Fridges
Product Description:
Alpicool Adventurer Folding Solar Panels Bag For Charging Portable Camping Fridges

Portable folding solar panel bag for off grid fridge use

Helping to extend time off-grid or when using a portable fridge on picnics or days out, the folding solar panel bag from Alpicool help keep food and drinks cooler in the sun for longer using solar energy.

Easily transported, stored and assembled solar panels

Available in either a 2 panel 100w or 4 panel 200w option, these solar panels can be adjusted using the stand legs for the most efficient charging angle to the sun. They can also be hung from suitable locations using the attached eyeholes for added charging flexibility.

Durable and Water Resistant

The panels are laminated making them robust, dust and water resistant to extend service life and use. 

Alpicool Adventurer SP100 Folding Solar Panels:

  • Rated Power: 100W
  • Working Voltage: 18v DC
  • Working Current: 5.5A
  • Short Circuit  Voltage: 23.5v DC
  • Open Circuit Current: 6.0A
  • Max Power Voltage: 19.5v DC
  • Max Power Current: 5.5A
  • Cell Type: Polycrystalline Silicon
  • Number of Panels: 2
  • Dimensions Folded: 650 x 510mm
  • Dimensions Unfolded: 1190 x 650mm
  • Weight: 3.65kg 

Alpicool Adventurer SP200 Folding Solar Panels:

  • Rated Power: 200W
  • Working Voltage: 18v DC
  • Working Current: 11A
  • Short Circuit  Voltage: 23.5v DC
  • Open Circuit Current: 11.88A
  • Max Power Voltage: 19.5v DC
  • Max Power Current: 11A
  • Cell Type: Polycrystalline Silicon
  • Number of Panels: 4
  • Dimensions Folded: 650 x 515mm
  • Dimensions Unfolded: 2230 x 650mm
  • Weight: 6.92kg
Product Availability: Fast delivery options available!

Product Name: CAN FO5010 Built-In Campervan and Caravan Gas Oven with Grill
Product Description:
CAN FO5010 Built-In Gas Oven and Grill

This easy clean stainless steel built-in gas oven with grill is a great sized unit for campervan or caravan installations. It also has the added convenience of a 12v flame ignition system.

Thermostatic gas valve operation

With efficient oven and grill burners of 1.90kW and 18kW respectively, these LPG burners are managed via thermostatic gas valve with a flame safety device for added peace of mind. LPG pressure is recommended between 28-30mbar.

Compact size with a generous cooking capacity

Thanks to a compact design and shallow oven depth, this combined oven and grill makes for an ideal appliance for caravan, campervan or van conversion installations. 

Features

  • Stainless Steel construction
  • Easy single dial control
  • Highly reliable
  • Low hinged door with glass front
  • Flame safety device
  • Thermostatic gas valve
  • 12 Volt ignition
  • 1.8kW oven burner
  • 1.3kW grill burner
  • Recommended gas supply - LPG 28-30mbar

Please check the CAN Instruction Booklet for Recessed Hole Measurements and Safety Distances

 CAN FO5010 Instruction Booklet

Product Name: Dodo Deadn Medium Campervan Sound Deadening Kit
Product Description:
Dodo Sound Deadening Kit For Medium Campervans

Reduce road buzz and driving noise of your campervan with a choice of sound deadening kits

These kits include enough sound deadening needed for medium sized campervans at the beginning of the van conversion process making for a quieter and more comfortable interior.

Two layer approach to sound deadening

Firstly, apply the Dodo Deadn Pro/Hex sheets to approximately 50-70% of the single skin steel area of the vehicle, including doors, wheel arches and panels. Application is easy thanks to the peel and stick backing of the Deadn Pro/Hex sheets. The 50 sheet pack of the Hex will approximately provide 4.7 sq.m of coverage, usually sufficient for VW T5 or similar sized pop top campervans. However, the slightly thicker Deadn Pro pack consisting of 40 sheets and provides coverage of approximately 3.7 sq.m with an improved level of sound reduction. 

Once the Deadn sheets have been applied to the interior of the campervan, the second sound reducing, and additional insulative layer, can be applied. Again, there is a choice of either Liner XPE or Liner Pro, in these kits, and it is placed on the campervan sides, roof and floor as needed. Being constructed of closed cell foam of 6mm in thickness, both provide additional sound reducing qualities and an insulating layer helping to regulate temperature within the rear cab area of the campervan.

Automotive designed quality materials for easy fit and forget installation

The Dodo range of products within these kits have been designed for simple, effective and trouble free installation in medium sized campervan vehicles. Using strong adhesives, quality closed cell foam with embossed aluminium layer, the kits make the initial stages of van conversion easy. Products have been tested to ensure they are safe for vehicle interiors and resistant to extreme heat. These kits are available in either a Standard or Pro version and both come complete with a heavy duty Mat Pro Metal Roller for improved adhesive bonding of sound deadening sheets.

We strongly recommend ensuring the surface to be covered with Deadn Hex/Pro and Liner products are degreased prior to application to ensure the best possible adhesion.

Dodo Sound Deadening Medium Campervan Kit Contains:

Pro Kit

  • Dodo Deadn Pro Bulk Pack (40 sheets) x 1
  • Dodo Thermo Liner Pro 6mm (3sq.m roll) x 2
  • Dodo Mat Pro Metal Roller x 1

Standard Kit

  • Dodo Deadn Hex Bulk Pack (50 sheets) x 1
  • Dodo Thermo Liner XPE 6mm (3sq.m roll) x 1
  • Dodo Mat Pro Metal Roller x 1

 Recommended For Medium Campervan Size Vehicles

  • Ford Custom
  • Mercedes Vito
  • PSA Van - Dispatch/Expert/Scudo
  • Toyota Proace
  • Vauxhall Vivaro/Renault Trafic/Nissan NV300
  • Volkswagen T5/T6

Product Name: Dodo Deadn Medium Panel Van Sound Deadening Kit
Product Description:
Dodo Sound Deadening Kits For Medium Panel Van Vehicles

Complete sound deadening kit

Correct sound deadening can reduce the 'tinny' sound often associated with panel vans on the road. These sound deadening kits featuring Dodo products, will take that noisy road buzz out of journeys. Improving the audible quality of the ride, means occupants will feel less fatigued and warmer thanks to the closed cell insulation interior. Available as either a Standard or Pro kit, they both include sound deadening panels, Thermo Liner and a Dodo Metal Roller, simply choose the insulation properties required for your installation.

Reduce noise and improve thermal quality

Ideally, Dodo Deadn Pro/Hex sheets should be used to cover approximately 50-70% of the single skin area of the vehicle. This should include panels, wheel arches and doors. Thanks to the easy peel and stick backing of the Deadn Pro/Hex sheets, apply in required position and using the roller, ensure a secure fit. The Deadn Pro and Hex packs come in 4.7sq.m and 3.7 sq.m packs respectively, and with two packs in each kit, this should provide sufficient coverage for medium sized panel vans such as ???.

Once the Deadn sheets have been affixed in the required areas, the second layer, either Liner Pro 6mm or Liner XPE 6mm, is applied. These closed cell foam liners provide additional noise reduction qualities as well as improving the thermal insulation of the panel van. This thermal layer can be applied to roof, floor and van sides, and being constructed from closed cell foam will not absorb moisture and are crush resistant. The adhesive backing protector is grid lined to aid cutting and can easily be shaped with the appropriate knife or scissors. Once in place, the strong adhesive will keep the liner in place and is resistant to extreme heats that can occur in vehicles. 

Automotive designed quality materials for easy fit and forget installation

These kits has been designed to make insulation easy and straight forward in medium sized panel van vehicles. The combination of string adhesives, premium quality closed cell foam, aluminium foil backed panels and easy to trim, yet robust materials, these kits make fitting easy. However, to ensure the best possible adhesion of Deadn panels and liners to surfaces, it is strongly recommend to degrease the surface prior to application to ensure the best possible adhesion.

Dodo Sound Deadening Medium Panel Van Kit Contains:

Pro Kit

  • Dodo Deadn Pro Bulk Pack (40 sheets) x 2
  • Dodo Thermo Liner Pro 6mm (3sq.m roll) x 5
  • Dodo Mat Pro Metal Roller x 1

Standard Kit

  • Dodo Deadn Hex Bulk Pack (50 sheets) x 2
  • Dodo Thermo Liner XPE 6mm (3sq.m roll) x 2
  • Dodo Mat Pro Metal Roller x 1

 Recommended For Medium Panel Van Size Vehicles

  • Ford Custom
  • Mercedes Vito
  • PSA Van - Dispatch/Expert/Scudo
  • Toyota Proace
  • Vauxhall Vivaro/Renault Trafic/Nissan NV300
  • Volkswagen T5/T6

Slim 135 litre compressor caravan and motorhome fridge freezer

The ADS 135 compressor fridge freezer utilises 'Surround Cooling' technology from Adventurer for fast and efficiently cooling even up to ambient temperatures of 43°C. Other features include a secure door latch to keep the door shut in transit and lightweight construction.

Product Name: Igloo 400 Series 10 Gallon Drinking Water Cooler with Tap
Product Description:
Igloo 400 Series 10 Gallon Drinking Water Cooler with Tap for Camping, Scouts and Construction Sites

The ideal Portable water cooler/dispenser for multiple occasions with a military green version for army and scout packs

Introducing the latest portable Igloo 400 IG04101 providing cool drinking water for any building site, campsite, festival, military and scout group use.  With its large water capacity and quick dispensing tap, the reusable 10-gallon water cooler will not only be the solution to your no mains water site but an easy and reliable drinking water source whenever you need it most.  In addition to your water being kept cool for a number of hours, it will also provide 160 glasses of water from every filled tank which means less filling and more drinking.  The water cooler can also hold ice for three days, even at 30 degrees.

Handy carry handles and easy "top up" lid for filling up quickly

This Igloo 400 portable water dispenser is also lightweight when empty, easy to move around and has handles on both sides to make transporting of the filled dispenser much easier.  It's simple to use design means it is easy for anyone to access drinking water unsupervised at any time and when needed.

400 Series 10 Gallon Portable Water Cooler Features:

  • Reinforced carry handles
  • Push and Release Water Button
  • Bright Visible Colour
  • Built in Handle on the lid
  • Durable
  • Heavy duty
  • Portable, Lightweight
  • Inbuilt Cooler
  • Drip Resistant Tap
  • Keeper Cord to allow the lid to hang at the side when filling
  • Keeps ice retention for three days
  • Pressure Fit Lid
  • Easy to clean and odour resistant

SunnCamp Swift Sun Canopy Caravan Awning

Simple and easy to install caravan porch canopy

Lightweight design and construction makes this SunnCamp Sun Canopy an ideal weekend porch for covering the caravan doorway or for providing some additional space for sitting under to make the most of your time away. 

Ideal for weekend or short stay holidays

With lightweight fibreglass and steel poles, and an open porch design, this sun canopy keeps the overall weight low but still provides protection from passing showers and the sun. A small pack size makes it easy to keep in your caravan ready for use.

Available in various canopy lengths

Depending upon the length of your caravan, there is a range of sizes best suited to your needs. The SunnCamp Swift Sun Canopy models have an awning rail height of between 235-250cm.

SunnCamp Swift Sun Canopy porch awning features:-

Product Description:
SunnCamp Luxury Caravan Awning Carpet

Add a touch of luxury to your caravan awning

Imagine the sensation of soft, warm carpet beneath your feet as you step out of your caravan and into the great outdoors. The Sunncamp Luxury Awning Carpet offers just that - a luxurious touch to your camping experience. Made from high-quality materials, this carpet not only adds a touch of elegance to your awning, but also provides insulation and cushioning for ultimate comfort. With its durable design and easy-to-clean surface, this awning carpet is the perfect addition to elevate your camping adventures. Indulge in the luxury of the great outdoors with the Sunncamp Luxury Awning Carpet. 

Hardwearing and easy to clean

Constructed of a breathable, rot-proof and UV-stabilised material, the SunnCamp Luxury caravan awning carpet is both stylish and tough, perfect for holidays with friends or families. Dirt can be easily removed with a damp cloth or hosing down with water for more stubborn stains. Designed to add extra protection, comfort and warmth underfoot in your caravan awning, the SunnCamp Luxury Awning Carpet comes in a range of sizes to fit SunnCamp Swift and Dash range of awnings. Due to the size of the carpets, they can be used as universal carpets for other popular brands of caravan and drive away awnings.

Compact size for storage

Packing down to a small size, the awning carpet comes with its own storage carry bag for easy storage and transportation. 

SunnCamp luxury padded awning carpet features:-

  • Breathable - will not damage grass beneath
  • Padded
  • Rot Proof
  • UV Stabilised
  • Carry bag included
  • Corner loops
  • Easy to clean
  • Suitable for SunnCamp Dash and Swift awnings

Product Description:
Victron Energy Lynx Shunt VE.Can

Intelligent shunt with built-in battery monitor

Consisting of a positive and negative busbar, battery monitor and main system fuse holder, this Lynx Shunt VE.Can can form part of the Lynx Distribution system or be utilised as a standalone battery monitor. The main fuse status is indicated with a power LED and, on compatible systems, an alarm message can be sent to a GX device. 

Programmable alarm relay

The Victron Lynx Shunt VE.Can alarm relay can be programmed via a GX device to activate under certain operating conditions, including battery voltage, battery temperature, state of battery charge or blown system main fuse.

Battery Monitoring Compatibility

This intelligent 1000A current rated shunt module can be used with all battery types including lithium that have a battery management system (BMS). Please note that when used with Victron's Lithium Smart Batteries, the Lynx Smart BMS must be used. 

Victron Energy Lynx Shunt VE.Can Specifications

  • Supply Voltage: 9-70VDC
  • Supported System Voltages: 12/24/48V
  • Continuous Current Rating: 1000A
  • Power Consumption:
    • 60mA @ 12V
    • 33mA @ 24V
    • 20mA @ 48V
  • Busbar Connection Size: M8
  • Fuse Connection Size: M8
  • VE.Can Connector: RJ45
  • Dimensions (h x w x d): 190 x 180 x 80mm
  • Weight: 1.4kg
  • IP Rating: IP22

Product Description:
Victron Energy Single Phase 100A Energy Meter for Campervan, Caravan, Motorhome

GX Device Compatible Energy Meter

The Victron Energy Single Phase 100A Energy Meter is a energy monitoring device designed to be used in Victron Energy Storage Systems (ESS), off-grid setups and other single phase electrical installations. Able to provide accurate measurements of power (W), energy (kWh) and current flow (A) at the distribution level.

This digital power meter is ideal for campervans, motorhomes, caravans and boats, suitable to implement into solar systems for PV inverter output monitoring, use for system-wide power monitoring in your motor home, and use for ESS control input in your caravan or campervan for efficient power management and battery charging. The Victron 100A Energy Meter can also be used for generator output monitoring to accurately measure the output of AC gensets, or for your campervans GX device. Integrate into your existing GX system to display data directly on your Victron GX device, such as the Cerbo GX or Color Control GX.

The Victron 100A Energy Meter power monitor supports two connection options for a flexible installation. Install with a wired connection with the RS485 interface with either 1.8m or 5.0m USB cable. Alternatively set up with a wireless connection via Zigbee for cable-free integration in your caravan.

Key Features

  • Single phase power monitoring up to 100A
  • Connects to Victron GX devices
  • Real time power, energy and current monitoring
  • Flexible installation wired or wireless (zigbee option)
  • Max current rating: 100A
  • Data connection: RS485
  • Essential for off-grid power management

Product Description:
Victron Energy Smart BatteryProtect 65A

Overview

Prevent excessive battery discharges damaging your battery with the Bluetooth enabled Victron Smart BatteryProtect. Operating on 12 or 24v systems, this Smart BatteryProtect is rated to a maximum continuous load of 65A and will automatically detect system voltage during the installation process. 

Simple installation and configuration

With a small and discreet footprint, clear labelling and M6 connection size, the Smart BatteryProtect with bluetooth programming makes installation and configuration simple and easy. Programmable engage/disengage levels are set via the Victron Connect app.

Ultra-low power consumption

Long term running of the Smart BatteryProtect is possible due to the ultra-low power consumption of 1.4mA and protective load disconnect delay of 90 seconds following a detection of the battery voltage dropping below the preset level.

Victron Energy Smart BatteryProtect BP-65 Specifications

  • Maximum continuous load current: 65A
  • Peak current (during 30 seconds): 250A
  • Operating voltage range: 6-35VDC
  • Current consumption: BLE On - 1.4mA BLE Off - 1.2mA
  • Alarm output delay: 12 seconds
  • Load disconnection delay: 90 seconds
  • Default thresholds:
    • Disengage - 10.5V or 21V
    • Engage - 12V or 24V
  • Weight: 0.2kg
  • Dimensions (h x w x d): 40 x 48 x106mm

Get the Victron Connect App

All settings of the Victron Smart BatteryProtect can be configured with the VictronConnect App

Click the Manual below to see the Victron Connect guide

Product Name: Screw On Caravan Motorhome Gas Regulator with 8mm or 10mm Outlet
Product Description:
Screw On Caravan Gas Locker Regulator Kit With 8mm or 10mm Outlet and Elbow Fitting

A low pressure screw on caravan gas locker regulator for caravan, motorhome or marine installation. This unit has the option of a 8mm or 10mm bulkhead regulator with a a straight connection leading off for gas hoses. An optional brass elbow fitting is also available for campervan regulators. Suitable for caravans, campervans and marine boats.

This gas regulator can be used in red vapour tanks, alu bottles and LPGSHOP composite refillable cylinders. Compatible with various gases including propane, butane, and LPG mix. Offering 30mbar outlet gas pressure to keep your gas appliances running efficiently. Compliant with EN 12864 Annex D Standards.

Designed for installation in bulkhead area 

This gas locker regulator kit is designed to be mounted on to the bulkhead on the inside of your caravan gas locker, the regulator is plumbed in to the main gas line and then connects directly with your gas cylinder via a gas hose. We strongly recommend that this item is installed by an NCC approved installer only.

Screw On Caravan Gas Locker Regulator Specifications

  • Max Inlet Pressure: 16bar
  • Operating Pressure: 30mbar
  • Capacity: 1.5kg/hr
  • Inlet Size: W20 Male
  • Outlet: 8mm or 10mm Copper compression with test point
  • Optional Extras: Elbow connector fitting
  • Part No.: RCARA8

Product Name: Cadac 2 Cook 3 Classic Dual Burner Stove
Product Description:
Cadac 2 Cook 3 Classic Dual Burner Cooker

The Cadac 2 Cook 3 Classic Stove is a portable gas cooker featuring two powerful burners for versatile cooking to suit your needs. With the included removable 2 pot stands, you have options to prepare a variety of meals on this cooker

Windshield protection for improved cooking efficiency

An incorporated rear wind shield in the lid and two removable side windshields helps to protect the flames for efficient and safer cooking. With its compact and lightweight design, the Cadac 2 Cook 3 Stove is easy to transport and store, making it a great choice for cooking outside your caravan, campervan or motorhome. Equally this lightweight, yet stable stove, is an ideal camping cook station for camp trips with family and friends.

Easy to clean and use 

With a durable construction, featuring stainless steel burners, and steel powder coated body and lid, this dual burner stove makes cooking fun and easy. This is a reliable cooker with long-lasting performance and easy cleaning surfaces. Independent piezo push buttons to each burner makes igniting gas safe and simple.

Stable base and storage bag

Grippy, rubber feet on the base ensure a firm and steady position when placed on camping tables or similar surfaces. All the items included in the Cadac 2 Cook 3 Classic Stove pack away to a compact size inside the storage bag included.

Cadac 2 Cook 3 Classic Stove cooker features:

  • Compact sized dual burner cooker
  • 2 detachable side windshields and a larger lid windshield protection form the wind
  • Piezo ignition
  • Powder coated body and lid
  • Includes 2 pot stands
  • Storage bag
  • Complete weight - 4.2kg
  • Unpackaged Dimensions (D x L x H) - 29 x 55 x 10cm

Product Name: Cadac 2 Cook 3 Pro Deluxe QR Stove
Product Description:
Cadac 2 Cook 3 Pro Deluxe Dual Burner Cooker

The Cadac 2 Cook 3 Pro Deluxe Dual Burner Stove with an incorporated quick release gas connection, is a portable gas cooker featuring two independent powerful burners for versatile cooking. The cooker includes a ceramic flat and ribbed grill plate, coffee pot stand, 2 pot stands and grill plate handle. These accessories provide the option to grill, fry or boil your next culinary delight.

Robust construction for confident use

Built with a tough powder coated steel lid and body and incorporating a thermoplastic base, this Cadac 2 Cook 3 Pro Deluxe cooker is designed to withstand the rigours of camping, caravan or motorhome trips and holidays. To make cleaning easier, the external surfaces of the stove can be wiped with warm soapy water making the post meal clean up simple and stress free.

Windshield protection and stable feet

For safe and effective cooking the Cadac 2 Cook 3 Pro Deluxe QR stove utilises two detachable side windshields and the large lid as an additional windshield. With these shields in place it is possible to reduce the risk of the cooker gas blowing out and improving gas efficiency during cooking. Rubber feet protectors ensure that the stove is stable and safe on a suitable surface even when cooking on both burners. 

Easy to set up, use  and store

Start cooking sooner with the integrated quick release coupling located at the side of the cooker, meaning no more wasted time looking for tools to connect. Each burner has a piezo ignition button alongside the gas control knob to make igniting easy and hassle free. To help keep the stove tidy and complete, a convenient storage bag is included. This is also ideal for safely transporting the cooker when not in use.

Cadac 2 Cook 3 Pro Deluxe QR stove features:

  • Dual burner cooker
  • Integrated QR coupling (with appropriate regulator not supplied)
  • 2 removable side windshields for improved wind protection
  • 2 independent gas control dials with individual Piezo ignition buttons
  • Thermoplastic base and a powder coated steel body and lid
  • Cooker set includes
    • Flat grill plate
    • Ribbed grill plate
    • 2 pot stands
    • Coffee pot stand
    • Grill plate handle
  • Storage bag
  • Complete weight - 5.8kg
  • Unpackaged Dimensions (D x L x H) - 29 x 55 x 10cm

Cadac BBQ 2 Plancha 30

When connected to the portable Cadac Safari Chef 30, the BBQ 2 Plancha 30 is a lightweight outdoor grill plate that features a flat and ribbed griddle surface, or "plancha," for cooking a variety of foods. Versatile cooking surface

The BBQ 2 Plancha 30 has a cooking surface diameter of 28cm, which is large enough to cook food for a small group of people. Product Name: Cadac Carri Chef 40 BBQ Chef Pan Combo
Product Description:
Cadac Carri Chef 40 BBQ Chef Pan Combo

Take your caravan and camping cooking to a new level with the Cadac Carri Chef 40 BBQ Chef Pan Combo. Combining the ever popular BBQ grill and Chef Pan together in one package provides a flexible setup to cover most camping, caravan or motorhome al-fresco cooking needs.

Collapsible carry system

Taking this stylish BBQ stove to the beach, campsite or picnic location is easy thanks to the packable design and handy storage bag, meaning tasty meals can be created wherever you want. Simply unpack the bag, slot the legs and BBQ base together, connect your gas and be grilling, frying or boiling in minutes.

Complete cooking options

The Cadac Carri Chef 40 BBQ Chef Pan Combo provides all the cooking surface options needed for feeding your family or friends with ease. The ceramic BBQ grid and Chef pan cover frying and grilling requirements, and with a removable pot stand, a stable base for larger pans or the optional paella pan 40, to further expand your cooking choices. A removable enamelled fat pan with flame peep holes makes clearing up easier after cooking up a feast. 

Easy to use controls

With fine adjustment controls and automatic piezo ignition, cooking can be managed simply and safely. Perfect cooking temperatures can be monitored and obtained with the handy thermometer within the vented dome lid. The lid, complete with Stay-Cool handle can hook on to the side of the BBQ, doubling up as a windshield if needed. 

Stable design 

The three legged design keeps weight down but also provides a solid cooking base for safe and effective cooking. One of the legs has an adjustable foot to ensure a level cooking platform. The utility shelf below the base unit provides additional storage area for utensils and is designed to safely seat the Power Pak gas supply units. 

Cadac Carri Chef 40 BBQ Chef Pan Combo features:

  • Single high performing burner BBQ
  • Dome lid with built in thermometer and stay-cool handle
  • Lid acts as a windshield for improved cooking
  • Ceramic BBQ griddle (39cm)
  • Ceramic Chef Pan (36cm)
  • Removable pot stand
  • Removable fat pan with flame peep holes
  • Adjustable fine temperature control
  • Automatic Piezo ignition
  • 3 leg design - one with adjustable foot
  • Storage bag for base unit with separate padded leg bag
  • Modular system compatible with all Series 40 cooking surfaces 
  • Complete weight - 12kg
  • Unpackaged Dimensions - 52 x 45 x 86cm
  • Packed Dimensions - 44 x 31 x 65cm
Product Warranty: 2 year limited warranty on Cadac gas barbeques.

Versatile cooking pan

Product Name: Cadac Safari Chef 30 Compact Gas BBQ
Product Description:
Cadac Safari Chef 30 Compact

Taking a complete, portable gas BBQ on your next picnic trip or camping holiday is possible thanks to this Cadac Safari Chef 30 Compact. Operating from lightweight and readily available 227g cartridges, with an easy locking system for added safety, the cartridge size enables this BBQ to be compact making carrying easy. 

Complete cooking solution system

This Cadac Safari Chef 30 Compact comes complete with a ceramic coated BBQ griddle and flat plate for quick, efficient cooking and cleaning. The enamelled fat pan also helps with post meal clean ups. A removable pot stand allows the gas BBQ to be used with standard pans and kettles for added flexibility. Even the enamelled dome can have a dual use as an additional cook pot. A truly versatile, compact picnic or camping BBQ!

Collapsible carry system

The stacking design of the Cadac Safari Chef 30 Compact results in a small unit for storage and the included storage bag keeps everything together until needed. Whether you're planning on a barbeque on the beach, cooking for family around the tent at the campsite or a picnic for friends in the park, the packable design and handy storage bag means this Cadac Safari Chef 30 Compact is an ideal gas powered BBQ to take along. 

Simple ignition system

A large and easily adjustable control knob with built-in piezo ignition makes lighting the Cadac Safari Chef 30 Compact easy every time you're cooking. In addition to this, connection and secure locking of the gas cylinders is effortless thanks to the single lever mechanism. Operating via the easily recognisable 227g gas cartridges, that are readily available in numerous outlets, so running out of gas shouldn't be a problem.

Table Top Design

With a sturdy yet lightweight base, ideal for use on suitable picnic tables and benches, this portable gas BBQ from Cadac provides confidence to cook meals when out and about. Equally, if being used out on the beach or on a hillside, the raised cooking area provides extra safety by keeping the flame away from the ground.

Cadac Safari Chef 30 Compact features:

  • Single burner BBQ
  • Stackable design with Ceramic BBQ Grid and Flat Grill Plate
  • Removable Pot Stand
  • Enamelled fat pan for easy cleaning
  • Enamelled pot/lid
  • Automatic piezo ignition
  • 227g Gas Cartridge operation
  • Storage bag for easy transportation
  • Complete weight - 4.5kg
  • Unpackaged Dimensions - 35 x 30 x 23cm
Product Warranty: 2 year limited warranty on Cadac gas barbeques for added peace of mind.

Product Name: Cadac Safari Chef 30 LP Pro QR Gas BBQ
Product Description:
Cadac Safari Chef 30 LP Pro QR

Camp cook in style and comfort with the Cadac Safari Chef 30 LP Pro QR gas barbeque. The sturdy folding leg design raises the cooking surface up to reduce aching backs when placed on the ground and also makes table top grilling and cooking more accessible and stable. A complete portable BBQ option for motorhome adventures, camping holidays, day trips or park picnics.

Complete cooking solution system

Multiple cooking surfaces for complete al-fresco dining. This Cadac Safari Chef 30 LP Pro QR gas barbeque comes with a ceramic coated BBQ griddle and flat plate, an enamelled fat pan to make cleaning easier, and a removable pot stand to use with standard pans and kettles. All of these accessories make this a great flexible BBQ to make most meal imaginable. In addition to this, the stainless steel Safari Chef 30 lid included with this set, can help cook food quicker, keep moisture in for rice dishes or stews, and keep bugs out of your food.

Cadac carry bag included

Once cooking is finished and clean up is over, the Safari Chef 30 LP Pro QR packs away into the included storage bag for easy transportation and can be stashed away safely until needed again. The compact and lightweight design makes taking it for picnics easy, yet this set is equally useful alongside the motorhome or campervan for a quick meal on your travels.

Independent ignition system

Have complete control over the cooking temperature with a large and easily adjustable flame dial at the front of the barbeque. Also, searching for matches or lighters is a thing of the past with a push button piezo ignition system for safe and reliable ignition time after time. Underneath the unit is an integrated quick release coupling for easy connection to a propane or butane regulated gas supply.

Folding leg design

To keep the overall packing size small, and to provide a more comfortable cooking experience, the sturdy folding legs raise the whole barbeque up to cook with the stress and strain of leaning over a lower grill. This Cadac Safari Chef 30 LP Pro QR is small enough to fit on a table, bench or counter yet powerful enough to cook meals for family, friends or solo adventures in style. Store it away in the boot of a car, in the garage area of motorhome or front gas locker of a caravan until your next barbeque.

Cadac Safari Chef 30 LP Pro QR features:

  • Single burner BBQ
  • Folding leg design
  • Stackable design with Ceramic BBQ Grid and Flat Grill Plate
  • Removable Pot Stand
  • Enamelled fat pan for easy cleaning
  • Stainless Steel Safari Chef 30 Lid
  • Automatic piezo ignition
  • Quick Release coupling for connection to Butane/Propane regulated supplies (with appropriate regulator not supplied)
  • Storage bag for easy transportation
  • Complete weight - 5.2kg
  • Unpackaged Dimensions - 31 x 31 x 31cm
Product Warranty: 2 year limited warranty on Cadac gas barbeques for added peace of mind.

Cadac Tapas Set

Expand your meal choices with the Cadac Tapas set. Ideal for camping breakfast meals including perfect eggs, savoury pancakes or separate lunch and evening dishes to add that stylish look to your next caravan holiday trip. 

Easy clean ceramic cooking surface

After meal time is over, the "GreenGrill" ceramic coated is a non toxic, non-stick surface makes camp washing up quick and easy. The ceramic surface is also scratch resistant and helps to retain heat at lower temperatures better providing more control over your cooking. 

Handy size

This Cadac Tapas set includes four 12cm diameter tapas dishes with stainless steel handles for easy and safe handling. Placing these dishes on a griddle or flat pan of your gas barbeque or stove offers an alternative way to fry, boil, simmer, cook or separate your favourite dishes. With four separate dishes, cooking a hearty camping breakfast to set you up for the day ahead is easy.

  • Suitable for use on a suitable griddle, flat pan or similar surface

Product Name: TBB Power Mezzo Kit Standard  Power Management System for Campervan and Motorhome
Product Description:
TBB Power Mezzo Standard Kit For Non Lithium Battery Systems 

A Complete Power Management And Leisure Battery Charging Kit

Gain ultimate control over your electrical system with the cutting-edge Mezzo campervan, caravan and motorhome Power Management System. This innovative and fully integrated solution gives you the power to monitor and regulate all aspects of your electrical system with ease and convenience.

At the heart of this system lies the LMP Master Power Unit, a powerhouse of technology that includes a built-in mains leisure battery charger, a solar charge controller, and a battery management system that provides a detailed overview of your power usage within your campervan, caravan or motorhome. With features including fresh and waste water tank level sensors, battery charging temperature compensation and a comprehensive set of permanent and switched outputs, the Mezzo kit ensures you're always in command.

Thanks to its range of control panels, wireless switches, and a user-friendly Bluetooth app, operating the Mezzo system is a breeze. When considering the requirements of campervan or motorhome owners, the designers have put a lot of thought and effort into creating a product that not only functions well, but is also aesthetically pleasing and is easy to use. Installation is quick and easy thanks to the automotive-grade WAGO style connectors to reduce installation time and enhance the security of electrical cable connections. Meanwhile full system integration optimizes all aspects of the system to maximize power utilization. Get ready to experience a whole new level of control with the Mezzo campervan and motorhome Power Management System.

Key Features of the TBB Mezzo Kit Standard

  • iOS and Android Mezzo app for system monitoring and control
  • LMP Master Power Unit with 30 Amp mains battery charger, 14 fused DC outputs to power appliances, 15 Amp PWM solar charge controller, dual water tank level measurement, and Lithium battery compatible
  • Fully integrated system, with all parts of the system connected to the central LMP Master Power Unit and fully optimised for peak efficiency
  • Wireless switch panel to operate the DC outputs means freedom of choice on location for ease of use
  • High quality and easy to fit WAGO style connectors for ease of installation
  • Highly upgradable with a wide range of optional extras

Mezzo Standard Kit

  • Mono control panel with Bluetooth for Mezzo app
  • LMP30 Master Power Unit
  • BM500 500A battery shunt connected to hub via RJ-45 ethernet cable 
  • PICO II RF wireless switch panel
  • NEMO DM1230 30 Amp battery to battery (DC-DC) charger
  • Fresh and waste water tank level probes
  • Complete data cable kit and hub

MONO Control Panel

  • 4.5" LCD display screen
  • 8 physical buttons for complete control
  • Bluetooth compatibility for connection with the free Mezzo app (iOS & Android)

LMP30 Master Power Unit

  • MEZZO system central control unit
  • 30 Amp 230V AC mains leisure battery charger
  • 15 Amp PWM solar charge controller
  • Fresh and waste water tank level measurement system
  • Compatible with all battery chemistry types - AGM/GEL/WET/LiFePO4
  • RF receiver for PICO II switch panel

BM500 Battery Shunt 500 Amp

  • Monitors battery to allow the system to calculate battery state of charge, historical information and other battery parameters
  • Connects to the LMP30 via the 8 port RJ-45 Hub 

NEMO Series DM Battery to Battery Chargers DM1230

  • Fully Euro 6 engine compatible
  • TBB Premium II multistage adaptive algorithm for improved charging
  • Built in automatic battery temperature compensation system (temperature sensor included)
  • Suitable for AGM, GEL, Wet and Lithium battery chemistry
  • Built in Battery Level Voltage Protection
  • Built in fuse protection
  • Data connection to LMP Master Power Unit
  • D+ or ACC activation monitoring
  • Quick, secure and easy WAGO style cable connectors

RSA/RSE-A Tank Sensor Kit

  • Top of tank installation probes for fresh and waste water tanks
  • Capacitive waste tank probe is not affected by dirt, solids or debris
  • Precise tank level measurement

PICO II RF Wireless Panel

  • Wireless installation for complete choice on location within your campervan, caravan or motorhome.
  • Clear labelling for ease of use
  • Surface mounted installation
  • Powered by 2 x coin type batteries
  • Programmable buttons using the Mezzo App

For added control over the Mezzo kit, the TBB Power Smartphone App, available on iOS or Android, provides bluetooth connectivity to monitor, adjust and control different elements of the Mezzo system. An example of Smartphone screenshots are shown below.

            

TBB Power Smart Control App

  

 To add flexibility and a more bespoke system to match your needs, there are upgrades available for the Mezzo Standard Kit

  • Control Panel - Upgrade the Mono Control Panel to the full feature LCD C4-BT panel. Bluetooth compatibility through the Mezzo App for increased convenience.
  • DC-DC charger - Harness more power from the motorhome or campervan electrical system with an upgraded DC-DC charger. DM1245 45A battery to battery charger or DMT1250 30A battery to battery charger with 20A bypass to power a 3-way fridge.

Product Name: Truma Frost Control For Caravan and Motorhome Water Heaters
Product Description:
Truma Frost Control Kit - John Guest connection

Truma Frost Control is an advanced technology designed to protect your caravan or motorhome from the damaging effects of freezing temperatures. It works by automatically emptying the water heater system should there be a threat of frost to prevent damage from water expansion during freezing. Suitable for water systems running at 2.8bar and operates via a power-free safety drain. 

With the Truma Frost Control installed you can relax and enjoy your travels without worrying about freezing temperatures causing costly damage to boilers. This device will give you the peace of mind that your motorhome and caravan is safe, even in the coldest of temperatures.

For connection to John Guest pipework.  

Genuine Truma Part No. 34020-00238

Product Description:
Vango Star 85 Battery Powered Camping Lantern

Soft light camping light

The Vango Star 85 LED Lantern is a versatile and durable lighting solution that's perfect for camping trips and outdoor adventures. With its powerful 85 lumens LED output, it can light up even the darkest of spaces and provide a warm, ambient glow. Its compact and lightweight design makes it easy to pack and take with you on the go, while the durable construction ensures it can withstand the rugged conditions of the great outdoors. Whether you're setting up camp after a long hike, or enjoying an evening sat around with friends and family, the Vango Star 85 Lantern is the perfect companion for your next adventure.

Versatile light settings and use

Depending upon your requirements you can choose between low or high light, offering 40 or 85 lumens respectively. Powered by 4 x AA batteries, runtime is between 12-32 hours depending upon power setting and usage. With a wide base, the Star 85 camping lantern is suitable for a tabletop or bench position. However, with the included hanging hook, the lantern can easily be converted to provide a higher light if needed. 

Vango Star 85 Camping Lantern Specifications

  • 2 settings- Low (40) / High (85) lumens
  • Produces a warm comforting light
  • Hanging hook for alternative positioning
  • Operates via 4xAA batteries (not included)
  • Runtime - 32hrs on low / 12hrs on high setting
  • Colours - Herbal (green) or River (blue)
  • Weight - 0.135kg
Product Warranty: Vango Star 85 Light is included in the 24 month warranty for added peace of mind
Product Availability: Vango Star Lights is sent 2-3 working days

Product Name: Vango Cove III Air Mid Campervan Drive Away Awning
Product Description:
Vango Cove III Air Mid Drive Away Campervan Awning

Inflatable Drive Away Campervan Awning 

The Vango Cove III Air Mid Drive Away Awning is a versatile and durable addition to a Transit, Ducato or similar sized campervan or motorhome. This drive away awning features Vango's exclusive AirBeam technology, which uses inflatable beams instead of traditional poles for quick and easy setup. The awning can be inflated in just a matter of minutes using the supplied pump, allowing you to start enjoying your time outdoors as soon as you arrive at your camping destination.

Front Facing Porch Awning

Vango have designed this awning with the opening porch door front facing, being the same direction as your campervan or motorhome to make the most of the views from your pitch. This configuration also provides additional privacy from other camping guests when set up. The Cove III Air Mid Drive Away awning is designed to fit onto the side of a campervan, motorhome or van conversion with a kador height of 215-255cm, and provides a generous amount of space for you and your family to relax and enjoy. The awning is made from Sentinel Active fabric, a strong, high-quality and waterproof fabric that will keep you dry and comfortable, even in inclement weather. The fabric is also UV resistant, protecting you and your family from the harmful rays of the sun.

Feature Rich Drive Away Awning

One of the key features of the Cove III Air Mid is the drive-away capability, which allows you to easily detach the awning from your vehicle and take off for day trips, without having to disassemble the entire setup. The awning also comes with a variety of convenient accessories, including a built-in groundsheet, a number of mesh windows for ventilation, toggled privacy windows, and with the Vango Tension Band System (TBS) and securing guy lines, the awning remains stable even in windy conditions.

Compatible with multiple campervan models

Overall, the Vango Cove III Air Mid Drive Away awning is a perfect choice for anyone looking for a durable and easy-to-use awning for a Ducato, Boxer or compatible height campervan or motorhome. With its inflatable beams, drive-away capability, and generous front porch are, this awning is sure to provide you and your family with many enjoyable outdoor experiences.

Vango Cove III Air Mid Drive Away Awning Features:

  • Front facing drive away awning for added privacy and improved views
  • Covered porch entry area
  • Sewn-in Groundsheet
  • Vango's Sentinel Active fabric provides a lightweight yet strong and fully waterproof outer shell
  • Pre-angled beams for greater internal space and effective bracing against winds
  • Vango Patented TBSII Tension Band System ensures your campervan awning performs in adverse weather conditions
  • Diamond Clear Windows maximise light and visibility
  • Toggled Privacy Curtains
  • Internal mesh front door panel for bug-free ventilation
  • Two Doors in Tunnel for convenient access to the front or back of your campervan
  • Roll away connecting tunnel for when you decide to drive off for the day leaving the awning in position
  • High and low level ventilation panels reduce condensation
  • Multiple Attachment Methods include pre-attached 6mm kador, over vehicle straps, roof bar attachment tabs and sleeve for pole and clamp
  • Suitable for Transit, Custom High Top, Ducato and similar campervan with a 215-255cm kador/awning rail height

Vango Cove Air Specification:

  • Total Weight 17.5kg
  • Canvas weight 6.70kg
  • Packed Dimensions (cm): L74 x W 41 x H 41
  • Awning Dimensions (cm): L310 x W320 x H205
  • Kador Length 260cm
  • Kador adjustable height 215-255cm
  • Pitch time: 10mins

 

Vango Cove Awning optional Extras:

  • Bedroom inner tent, sleeps 2 - BR001
  • Universal carpet fits Cove awning - CP004
  • Footprint groundsheet protector - GP001
  • Vango drive away fixing kit 4x6mm or 6x6mm

 

Installation Instructions
Product Warranty: The Vango Cove III Air Mid Drive Away Awning comes with a 2 year manufacturers warranty which can be extended to 3 years by registering the product with Vango.

Product Name: Vango Galli Pro Air Campervan Motorhome Driveaway Awning
Product Description:
Vango Galli Pro Air Mid Drive Away Campervan or Motorhome Awning

Front Facing Inflatable Campervan Awning

The Vango Galli Pro Air Drive Away Awning provides a versatile and durable awning tent for campervan or motorhome owners looking for some additional space. The Galli Pro Air drive away awning features Vango's new and exclusive Sentinel ECO Pro fabric, constructed from recycled single use plastics, for an eco-friendly, durable ripstop material. With AirBeam technology inflatable beams, a sturdy alternative to traditional poles, the awning is quick and easy to pitch each and every time. With a rapid inflation times, this campervan or motorhome drive away awning is perfect for making the most of your short weekends trips away or extended summer touring.

Front Facing Porch Drive Away Camper van Awning

The Galli Pro Air awning is designed with the opening porch door front facing, and being the same direction as your campervan or motorhome, it allows you to make the most of the views from your pitch and provides additional privacy from other campers. Designed to fit onto the side of a campervan, motorhome or van conversion with a kador height of between 180cm to 295cm, depending upon the model, this drive away awning will provide a generous amount of space for you and your family to relax and enjoy. The awning also offers a sheltered front porch for additional protection from the elements.

Driveaway Campervan Awning - Additional Features

A key feature of the Galli Pro Air is the ability to easily detach the awning from your vehicle and head off for the day, happy in the knowledge that you do not need to disassemble and pack away the entire awning setup. Additional features of the awning includes Skylight Windows running the length of the roof for improved daylight and perfect for night-time star gazing. Accessing the awning with prams or with reduced mobility is much easier and safer thanks to the Easy Access Doors. The Galli Pro Air drive away awning is available in three kador attachment heights suitable for campervans or motorhomes ranging from 180 to 295cm.

Vango Galli Pro Air Driveaway Campervan Awning Features:

  • Front facing awning for added privacy and improved views
  • Skylight Roof Windows
  • Sewn-in Groundsheet
  • Vango's Sentinel ECO Pro fabric constructed from recycled fabrics is lightweight, strong and waterproof
  • Pre-angled beams mean greater internal space and effective bracing against winds
  • Vango Patented TBSII Tension Band System ensures your campervan awning performs in adverse weather conditions
  • High Visibility Guy lines
  • Adjustable Pegging System
  • Diamond Clear Windows maximise light and visibility
  • Zipped Privacy Curtains
  • Two Doors in Tunnel for convenient access to the front or back of your vehicle
  • Roll Away Connecting Tunnel for when you drive away from your campervan for the day
  • Airzone ventilation panels reduce condensation
  • Multiple Attachment Methods include pre-attached 6mm kador, over vehicle straps, roof bar attachment tabs and sleeve for pole and clamp
  • Shadow Grey Colour

Product Name: Igloo ECOCOOL Recycled Plastic Camping Cool Box Range
Product Description:
Igloo ECOCOOL Latitude Recycled Plastic Eco-Friendly Cool Boxes

The Igloo ECOCOOL Latitude range of recycled plastic cool boxes will launch in the UK in May 2023. Pop your email in below and we will keep you updated!

The Igloo ECOCOOL range of cool boxes is finally available in the UK! The worlds first cool boxes manufactured using recycled plastic, in addition to being eco-friendly and better for the earth, the ECOCOOL range of cool boxes from Igloo are every bit as durable and offer the same performance as the standard range, but with a greener footprint!

ECOCOOL Latitude by Igloo

Having always led the way in eco-friendly cool box manufacturing, the ECOCOOL range is the latest chapter in the Igloo story. With Igloo THERMECOOL insulation and with the body and lid manufactured using recycled plastic post-consumer resin, the Igloo ECOCOOL range of cool boxes are the most eco-friendly hard side cool box on earth!

Igloo ECOCOOL Recycled Plastic Cool Box Features

  • Eco-friendly with great performance
  • Made using post-consumer recycled plastic
  • Igloo THERMECOOL eco-friendly insulation
  • Available in a range of sizes
  • Exclusive Igloo ECOCOOL green colourway
  • Igloo CoolRiser technology
  • Manufactured in the USA
  • ECOCOOL Latitude 60 - up-to 4 days ice retention*
  • ECOCOOL Latitude 52 - up-to 4 days ice retention*
  • ECOCOOL Latitude 30 - up to 3 days ice retention*

Igloo ECOCOOL Eco-Friendly Ice Cool Box Details

  • Model Range: Igloo ECOCOOL Eco-Friendly Ice Cool Box
  • Material: Post-consumer recycled plastic resin
  • Insulation: Igloo THERMECOOL eco-friendly insulation
  • Igloo ECOCOOL Latitude 30 SKU: 50489 IG50489
  • Igloo ECOCOOL Latitude 52 SKU: 50491 IG50491

Product Name: Vitrifrigo VTR5070 DG 3-way LPG 12v 240v Compact Caravan Fridge
Product Description:
Vitrifrigo VTR5070 DG 3 Way Caravan LPG 240v 12v Wheel Arch Fridge Freezer

PLEASE NOTE: The Vitrifrigo VTR 5070 DG caravan fridge is a special order item and available with a 16-18 week lead time.

The Vitrifrigo VT5070 DG fridge is a compact 3-way gas and electric fridge that is suitable for most caravans and motorhomes to replace a Dometic RM 5330.

Fully featured fridge and freezer, 61 litres capacity.

The VTR5070 DG 3 way fridge from Vitrifrigo has 61 litres gross capacity, and is still able to operate on LPG butane / propane gas, 230V AC mains electric, and 12v DC leisure battery. The VTR5070 DG fridge has an electric thermostat and 3-position gas valve allowing the user to manual control the desired power source. The Vitrifrigo VTR5070 DG caravan fridge also features a reversible door allowing it to be opened on either a left or right hinge.

Dimensions similar to the Dometic RM 5330

The dimensions of the Vitrifrigo VTR5070 DG refrigerator mean it is now the nearest replacement in terms of size to the now discontinued Dometic RM 5330 wheel arch fridge installed in many small caravans. It may also serve as a replacement for those looking to replace the Dometic RM122 with a 3-way gas model.

Vitrifrigo VTR5070 DG LPG Compact Caravan Fridge Dimensions

Whilst the Vitrifrigo VTR5070 DG is the nearest replacement for the Dometic RM 5330 caravan fridge in terms of dimensions and the wheel arch moulding, however it is vital you measure the space you have as they are not exactly the same:

  • Height: 823mm
  • Width: 485mm
  • Depth: 491mm

Vitrifrigo VTR5070 DG Caravan Fridge Specs

  • Fridge Capacity: 61.5 Litres
  • Freezer Capacity: 8.3 Litres
  • Power Source: LPG gas - 12V DC leisure battery - 230V AC mains electric
  • Reversible Door: Yes
  • Net weight: 28Kg
  • Typical energy consumption: 110W/h AC/DC - 19.1g/h LPG
  • All gas appliances must be fitted by a qualified gas engineer, failure to comply may affect your warranty.
Product Warranty: 24 Month Warranty on all Vitrifrigo fridges
Product Availability: #The Vitrifrigo VTR5070 DG is a special-order item and is delivered in 12-16 weeks.

Product Name: Comet Arona 12v Caravan Motorhome Tap Chrome or Black and Chrome
Product Description:
Comet Arona 12v Campervan Caravan Water Tap

The Comet Arona Water Tap is a sleek and stylish addition to any campervan or motorhome kitchen. With a modern design feature of a curved spout and a polished chrome or partial black and chrome finish, this 12v water tap is available in both a cold or mixer option and will complement any caravan or motorhome kitchen area.

Precision Control 

The tap is designed for caravan, motorhome or campervan use, making it perfect for filling up a pitcher of water, rinsing fruits and vegetables, washing hands before meal prep or doing dishes after dinner. The handle operated microswitch is easy to turn and provides precise control over the water flow, allowing you to easily adjust the pressure to your liking. The Arona Mixer Tap also provides the ability to control the balance of hot and cold water for optimal use. 

Easy installation and cleaning

The Comet Arona taps are manufactured in a stunning chrome or black and chrome finish, and along with a rotating 170mm spout, this tap is versatile for most installations. The finish makes cleaning easy and is durable, built to last, making it a great choice for any campervan or caravan. Supplied with a built-in micro switch, 240mm connecting cables, push on barbed connection and removable aerator to extend life of the tap.

Dimensions:

  • 130 mm height from base
  • 35mm thread length
  • 22mm base cold - 27mm base mixer
  • 10mm Barbed connections
  • 240mm cable length
  • Suitable for water pressures up to 1.5Bar.
Product Warranty: 12 month warranty with the Comet Arona Water Tap.
Product Availability: The Comet Arona Tap is sent on a next working day delivery

Product Name: Truma Combi 4E Boiler and Space Heater Complete Kit With iNetX Control Panel
Product Description:
Truma Combi 4E Boiler and Space Heater Complete Kit With iNet X Control Panel

The Truma Combi 4E with iNet X Control Panel is a popular choice for heating both water and living spaces in your campervan, motorhome or caravan. The Combi 4E is energy efficient and quiet in operation, and incredibly compact and lightweight for the performance it offers.

iNet X included

Now supplied with the iNet X controller, this Truma 4E Combi kit includes the new 4.3” colour touchscreen smart control panel that provides real-time status on all appliances and services, and can control two Truma appliances at once such as the Truma Combi Boiler and a Truma Air Conditioner. Add to this the ability to operate appliances from different manufacturers all from one screen, this truly is a next generation control panel. Fault finding is also considerably easier on the iNET X control panel with faults being clearly described and a new step by step troubleshooting feature that easily guides you through rectifying any issues.

Take system control one step further by connecting the free Truma iNet X App via Bluetooth to operate or monitor your appliances remotely and easily, ensuring you have the latest software updates and extensions. For the most recent list of compatible appliances please check the Truma Device List.

All year round functionality

The integrated 10-litre stainless steel water tank allows for independent heating of hot water in summer mode and both hot water and warm air in winter mode. The Combi 4E can operate on either 230V electric mains voltage or LPG gas, providing hot water and warmth whether on a camping site or in the wild. 

Versatile operation on LPG gas or electric

Able to operate on either 230V electric mains voltage or on LPG, the Combi 4E provides hot water, and a warm campervan, motorhome, or caravan, whether on a camping site, or in the wild. You can even use both electric and gas energy sources in unison for rapid heating times.

Available to purchase with ducting kit included.

The Combi 4E complete kit contains:

  • Truma Combi 4E LPG gas and 230V electric unit
  • Truma iNet X control panel
  • John Guest connection kit

Please note that the Truma Room Temperature Sensor Cable is not included in the kit.

Truma Combi 4E Technical Specifications

  • Heater model: Truma Combi 4E
  • Dimensions (L x W x H): 510 x 450 x 300 mm
  • Installation dimensions (L x W x H): 540 x 500 x 350mm**
  • Weight (when empty of water): 15.1kg
  • Heating time (from 15°C to 60°C) (Water only): Approx. 20min.
  • Heating time (from 15°C to 60°C) (Heater + Water): Approx. 80min.
  • Rated thermal output (Electric): 900/1800W
  • Rated thermal output (Gas): 2000/4000W
  • Rated thermal output (Electric & Gas Combined): 3800W
  • Fuel consumption (Gas): 160–320 g/h
  • Water capacity: 10 litres
  • Air flow rate: Max. 287 m3/h
  • Power consumption (at 230V): 3.9A / 7.8A
  • Power consumption (at 12V): Heating up boiler 0.2A up to temporary max. of 5.6A (average approx. 1.1A)
  • Water pressure: MAX 2.8 Bar
  • Please note: Combi comes with black cowl as standard.

    **Please note in addition to the installation dimensions, extra space must be provided as appropriate for the gas and water connections as well as the drain valve.

Truma Combi 4E Dimensions:

Product Description:
Victron Energy BlueSolar 185W Monocrystalline Solar Panel

High quality panels from a leading name in solar panel equipment

The Victron 185W Monocrystalline Solar Panel is a high-performance solar panel that is designed for a variety of applications including installation on campervan, caravan motorhomes and marine for users looking to have extended periods in more remote locations. The Victron solar panel is made of monocrystalline silicon, which is known for its high efficiency and durability, ideal for motorhome and campervan installations. Victron solar panels also have a sleek, rigid anodized aluminium frame, making it tough and corrosion-resistant.

Harness the power of the sun

Victron solar panels have a nominal power output of 175 watts, and a maximum power voltage of 19.4V, and with high performance bypass diode technology, power drops due to shaded locations are kept to a minimum. The Victron solar panel features tempered glass for enhanced strength and impact resistance, designed to withstand harsh weather conditions and climates.

The perfect solution for caravans campervans motorhomes marine and remote off grid locations

In summary, the Victron 185W Monocrystalline Solar Panel is a high-performance, durable and efficient solar panel that is well-suited for a variety of off-grid and remote power applications. Its sleek design and high-quality construction make it a reliable and long-lasting addition to any solar power system.

Victron Energy BlueSolar 185W Solar Panel Specifications

  • Nominal Power (W): 185W
  • Max-Power Voltage Pmmp (V): 19.4V
  • Max-Power Current Vmpp (A): 9.03A
  • Open Circuit Voltage (V): 23.7V
  • Short-Circuit Current (A): 9.89A
  • Cell Type: Monocrystalline
  • Dimensions: 1485 x 668 x 30mm
  • Net Weight: 11kg
  • Frame Material: Aluminium
  • Connector Type: 900mm MC4
  • Campervan Motorhome and Marine applications
  • SPM041851200

Product Name: Vango Poled Sun Canopy Awning 3 Metre
Product Description:
Vango Poled Sun Canopy For Caravan Motorhome and Campervans

Easy Pitch Sun Canopy

The Vango Poled Sun Canopy is the perfect addition to your camping setup. With its durable and waterproof Sentinel Active fabric, and strong, sturdy PowerFlex fibreglass poles, this provides a strong structure that will keep you protected from the elements while you enjoy the great outdoors whether in your caravan, campervan or motorhome. The Vango Poled Sun Canopy is both easy to set up and take down, making it a great choice for short caravan trips and quick motorhome weekend getaways. Whether you're looking for some shade during the day or a place to gather with friends and family at night, the Vango Poled Sun Canopy has got you covered.

Tough Sentinel Active Fabric

Despite being a lightweight fabric, the 70d polyester Sentinel Active provides many features needed for the rigours of outdoor adventures. A protective waterproof outer fabric keeps rain showers at bay and the fully tapered seals prevent water seeping through for added peace of mind. Add to this the canopy fabric offers UPF30 UV protection for those sunny summer days. 

Lightweight and Compact Awning

With a small pack size and lightweight fabric, this poled Sun Canopy is a great item to have stored away ready for your next caravan, campervan or motorhome adventure. When connected to the awning rail of your caravan, campervan or motorhome, it provides a large covered spacious area for dining, sheltering from the sun or enjoying the late summer evening sun next. The canopy, poles and steel pegs pack away into the supplied carry bag making it a useful addition for short breaks and weekends away.

Vango Poled Sun Canopy Specifications

  • Canopy Fabric: Sentinel Active Fabric
  • Poles: Powerflex Fibreglass Poles
  • Straight Kador Length: 300cm
  • Pitch Time: 5 minutes
  • Packsize L x H x W: 68 x 13 x 13cm
  • Total Weight: 3.4kg
  • Suitable for motorhome, caravan or campervan use
Product Warranty: Vango provide a 2 year limited warranty on the 3 Metre Sun Canopy with the option to register for an additional year.

Product Name: Dimatec Chrome Recessed LED Downlight Default On Memory
Product Description:
Dimatec LED Spot Light Chrome Finish With Switch Memory

This Dimatec Chrome Touch operated 18 LED light comes complete with a "memory" function, turns the light back on when the main power supply is removed. Designed to be recessed into a hole of 52mm diameter with a discreet protrusion of 1.3m, making them a sleek downlight ideal for retro fit installs or new installations. Complete with a pair of connecting cables approximately 200mm in length. The Dimatec LED Spot Light Chrome Finish With Switch Memory is an elegant and functional lighting solution, perfect for enhancing the ambiance of your caravan, campervan, or motorhome.

Key Features:

  • Memory Function: The spotlight features a convenient memory function that automatically restores the previous light setting when the main power supply is turned back on, ensuring consistent lighting without the need for manual adjustments.
  • Chrome Finish: The polished chrome finish adds a modern and sophisticated touch to your space, making it an ideal choice for both retrofits and new installations.
  • Touch Control: Operated by a simple touch, this spotlight provides easy and intuitive control over your lighting.
  • Warm White Light: Emits a warm white light at 3000K, creating a cozy and inviting atmosphere within your vehicle.
  • Sleek Design: Designed for recessed installation, the spotlight has a minimal protrusion of just 1.3mm from the mounting surface, offering a clean and seamless look.

Product Name: Vango Tailgate Groundsheet Protective Footprint GP010
Product Description:
Vango Tailgate Awning Groundsheet Footprint

Protect your campervan tailgate awning with this durable groundsheet protector - GP010

This Vango footprint, with a small lightweight packsize, provides a tough and hard wearing protective barrier for your campervan tailgate awning. Designed to keep the awning base clean and protected from stones and other items that could potentially damage the floor, this footprint provides additional protection from water and mud, helping to reduce dirt in your campervan and is also easy to clean after use. 

Helpful pitching guide

When arriving at your intended location, use the tailgate awning footprint as a pitch marker to plan where to pitch before setting up your awning and campervan. This helps remove any items that could intrude on the awning itself and can help you find the best position on site for maximum sun or shelter from the rain.

Awning Compatibility

The Vango Tailgate Awning Footprint GP010, is designed for use with the Vango Tailgate Hub Low and Vango Tailgate AirHub Low range of campervan awnings.
Product Warranty: The Vango Tailgate Awning Footprint is covered by a limited 2 year warranty for added peace of mind.

Dometic Rally Awning 

Poled Caravan Awning

The Dometic Rally range of awnings are the ultimate outdoor accessory for the adventurous traveller or weekend camper. With its sleek, compact design and strong DynaLite aluminium poles, this awning provides ample shade and protection from the elements, no matter where your travels take you. The weather resistant Weathershield 150D fabric is tough, durable and lightweight, taking the knocks and scrapes associated with adventurous holidays.

Ground-breaking versatility

The Rally features a multi-height fixing system which enables it to fit both caravans and motorhomes. Simply unzip the gusseted side panel, peg the awning down to fine tune the fitment, then close the internal zips to hide any excess material.

Rally awning features:

  • Multi height fixing for a precise fit to the vehicle (connection height 235cm Min. - 265cm Max)

Awning includes:

  • Peg bag

Product Name: TBB Power Mezzo Kit Standard Plus  Power Management System for Campervan and Motorhome
Product Description:
TBB Power Mezzo Kit Standard Plus For Non Lithium Battery Systems 

Power Management Kit Complete With Inverter 

Take control of your electrical setup with the state-of-the-art Mezzo Power Management System for campervans, caravans, and motorhomes. This cutting-edge solution allows you to effortlessly monitor and regulate all aspects of your electrical system for maximum efficiency.

At the core of this system is the powerful LMP Master Power Unit, featuring a built-in mains battery charger, solar charge controller, and a comprehensive battery management system that gives you a clear picture of your power consumption. With features like fresh and waste water tank sensors, battery charging temperature compensation, and a variety of permanent and switched outputs, the Mezzo kit puts you in charge. To finish off the kit, a powerful inverter provides 230V power for full off-grid travelling.

The Mezzo system is user-friendly, with control panels, wireless switches, and a convenient Bluetooth app making operation a breeze. The design team has taken into consideration the needs of campervan and motorhome owners, creating a product that is not only functional but also attractive and easy to use. Installation is quick and hassle-free with automotive-grade WAGO style connectors, reducing installation time and enhancing the security of electrical cable connections. Full system integration including inverter optimizes all aspects of the system for maximum power utilization.

Unleash the full potential with the Mezzo Kit Standard by including a 1500W pure sine wave inverter with bypass feature and an internally pre-wired consumer unit that is designed to specifically work with the innovative inverter bypass system.  This simple, yet ingenious design feature allows 230V AC mains appliances and sockets to be connected directly to the inverter with no external switch over needed.  When the inverter detects a 230V AC mains supply from the vehicle hook up (via the FB15 consumer unit), it automatically switches off the inverter and within just 30ms switches over to the hook up supply.

Key Features of the TBB Mezzo Power Management System

  • iOS and Android Mezzo app for system monitoring and control
  • LMP Master Power Unit with 30 Amp mains battery charger, 14 fused DC outputs to power appliances, 15 Amp PWM solar charge controller, dual water tank level measurement, and Lithium battery compatible
  • 1500W continuous pure sine wave inverter with bypass and pre-wired consumer unit, so when vehicle is connected to the mains hook up the inverter shuts down and appliances are switched to mains supply automatically
  • Fully integrated system, with all parts of the system connected to the central LMP Master Power Unit and fully optimised for peak efficiency
  • Wireless switch panel to operate the DC outputs means freedom of choice on location for ease of use
  • High quality and easy to fit WAGO style connectors for ease of installation
  • Highly upgradable with a wide range of optional extras

Mezzo Standard Plus Kit

  • Mono control panel with Bluetooth for Mezzo app
  • LMP30 Master Power Unit
  • IH1500L-BYP 1500W pure sine wave inverter with bypass
  • FB15 pre-wired consumer unit with internal bypass wiring
  • BM500 500A battery shunt connected to hub via RJ-45 ethernet cable 
  • PICO II RF wireless switch panel
  • NEMO DM1230 30 Amp battery to battery (DC-DC) charger
  • Fresh and waste water tank level probes
  • Complete data cable kit and hub

MONO Control Panel

  • 4.5" LCD display screen
  • 8 physical buttons for complete control
  • Bluetooth compatibility for connection with the free Mezzo app (iOS & Android)

LMP30 Master Power Unit

  • MEZZO system central control unit
  • 30 Amp 230V AC mains leisure battery charger
  • 15 Amp PWM solar charge controller
  • Fresh and waste water tank level measurement system
  • Compatible with all battery chemistry types - AGM/GEL/WET/LiFePO4
  • RF receiver for PICO II switch panel

IH1500L-BYP 1500W Inverter with Bypass

  • 12V DC input with 1500W continuous 230V AC output @ 35°C
  • Maximum 230V AC power output (1 min) 1600W
  • 230V AC output 50/60Hz
  • 230V AC bypass (170-260VAC) max current output 30 Amp
  • Bypass function allows the inverter to automatically switch off when it detects AC power from a hook up input and switch the appliance to be powered directly from the hook up

FB15 Consumer Unit

  • 2x RCCB 30mA 16 Amp and 1x MCB 16 Amp
  • Prewired internally for bypass function of inverter
  • Quick, secure and easy WAGO style external cable connectors

BM500 Battery Shunt 500 Amp

  • Monitors battery to allow the system to calculate battery state of charge, historical information and other battery parameters
  • Connects to the LMP30 via the 8 port RJ-45 Hub 

NEMO Series DM Battery to Battery Chargers DM1230

  • Fully Euro 6 engine compatible
  • TBB Premium II multistage adaptive algorithm for improved charging
  • Built in automatic battery temperature compensation system (temperature sensor included)
  • Suitable for AGM, GEL, Wet and Lithium battery chemistry
  • Built in Battery Level Voltage Protection
  • Built in fuse protection
  • Data connection to LMP Master Power Unit
  • D+ or ACC activation monitoring
  • Quick, secure and easy WAGO style cable connectors

RSA/RSE-A Tank Sensor Kit

  • Top of tank installation probes for fresh and waste water tanks
  • Capacitive waste tank probe is not affected by dirt, solids or debris
  • Precise tank level measurement

PICO II RF Wireless Panel

  • Wireless installation for complete choice on location within your campervan, caravan or motorhome.
  • Clear labelling for ease of use
  • Surface mounted installation
  • Powered by 2 x coin type batteries
  • Programmable buttons using the Mezzo App

For added control over the Mezzo kit, the TBB Power Smartphone App, available on iOS or Android, provides bluetooth connectivity to monitor, adjust and control different elements of the Mezzo system. An example of Smartphone screenshots are shown below.

            

TBB Power Smart Control App

 

For added flexibility and to provide a more bespoke system to match your needs, there are upgrades available for the Mezzo Standard Kit

  • Control Panel - Upgrade the Mono Control Panel to the full feature LCD C4-BT panel. Bluetooth compatibility through the Mezzo App for increased convenience.
  • DC-DC charger - Harness more power from the motorhome or campervan electrical system with an upgraded DC-DC charger. DM1245 45A battery to battery charger or DMT1250 30A battery to battery charger with 20A bypass to power a 3-way fridge.

Product Description:
TBB Power Mezzo Premium Kit With Lithium Battery 

A Complete Power Management And Leisure Battery Charging Kit

Gain ultimate control over your electrical system with the cutting-edge Mezzo campervan, caravan and motorhome Power Management System. This innovative and fully integrated solution gives you the power to monitor and regulate all aspects of your electrical system with ease and convenience.

At the heart of this system lies the LMP Master Power Unit, a powerhouse of technology that includes a built-in mains leisure battery charger, a solar charge controller, and a battery management system that provides a detailed overview of your power usage within your campervan, caravan or motorhome. With features including fresh and waste water tank level sensors, battery charging temperature compensation and a comprehensive set of permanent and switched outputs, the Mezzo kit ensures you're always in command.

Experience ultimate power and reliability with the MEZZO kit Premium including a 100Ah LiFePO4 Lithium leisure battery, making it perfect for off-grid living. The Mezzo Kit Premium is the same as the Mezzo Kit Standard, but the BM500 battery shunt is replaced with an M12-100H 100ah LiFePO4 Lithium battery. This Lithium Phosphate battery is light, has a high level of charge and discharge capability (can be charged quicker than a traditional leisure battery), has a comprehensive Battery Management System, built-in shunt and can operate a very low temperatures. This will operate effectively down to -30 Degrees C due to the built in heater, so is perfect for off-grid vehicles.

Product Name: Victron Energy 12 Volt 60Ah Deep Cycle AGM Batteries
Product Description:
Victron Energy 12v 60Ah AGM Deep Cycle Batteries

60Ah Leisure Battery for Caravans, Motorhomes, Campervans, and Marine,

These 60Ah AGM Leisure Batteries from Victron have outstanding high current performance and feature VRLA (Valve Regulated Lead Acid) technology, which means they are completely sealed for your safety. The built-in battery valves are programmed to only release gas in the unlikely event of overcharging or cell failure, ensuring your peace of mind and security while using an AGM battery. Plus, with the added benefit of VRLA technology, Victron Energy 12v 60Ah AGM Deep Cycle Leisure Batteries require absolutely no maintenance throughout their entire life. So go ahead, power up your campervan motorhome caravan or boat with confidence and ease!

High performing Victron AGM batteries

With a Victron AGM (Absorbent Glass Mat) leisure battery, the electrolyte power is absorbed into a glass-fibre mat in a closer proximity to the active material of the battery, this allows movement of electrical charge more rapidly. This makes Victron 60Ah AGM deep cycle batteries more suitable for delivering high current power over a shorter period of time compared to Gel batteries.

Deep Discharge Recovery

These Victron batteries with VRLA, have the ability to re-gain charge, even from a deep or prolonged discharged state. However, repeated and prolonged deep discharging will have a negative effect on the service life of all lead acid leisure batteries including Victron.

Applications

Caravans, motorhomes, campervans, boats, marine,
