Product Name: Outwell ECOLux 24L Cool Box 12V/230V - White Bamboo
Product Description:
Outwell ECOLux 24L Cool Box 12V/230V - White Bamboo

Eco Cooler Coolbox

Introducing the Outwell ECOcool Cool Box - the ultimate cooling companion for your outdoor adventures! Equipped with a thermally efficient and insulated design, this cool box delivers top-notch cooling performance without taking up your precious car or motorhome leisure battery. With its impressive efficiency, you can chill your food and drinks to perfection while still having enough power to keep your other appliances up and running. So, whether you're embarking on a weekend camping trip or a long road journey, the Outwell ECOcool Cool Box has got your back, keeping your refreshments icy cold and provides a useful 24 liltre capacity.

Great as a home cool box, great as a camping cool box

With a versatile design, this 24 litre cool box excels in multiple environments. Well suited to camping trips, picnics and festivals, it can run off the 12V provided by your leisure or vehicle battery. At home however you can use the 230V provided by you mains outlets, making this great for parties. A choice of two cooling settings ECOcool, or Max cooling, gives you added control. With a USB port and LED light in the lid, this is a feature packed coolbox.

Cool box or heater

The Outwell ECOcool isn't limited to cooling, either. Whilst as a cooler it can reduce take your food and drinks 18-25 °C below the outside temperature, it can raise the temperature by 50-60 °C, allowing you to keep food warm for guests. These versatile features, combined with the robust finish and fold-flat bamboo handle, make it a great choice for a range of events.

Outwell ECOcool Cool Box features:

  • Can operate on both 12V and 230V
  • Two cooling settings
  • Cools to 18-25 °C  below ambient
  • In warming mode, can warm by 50-60 °C
  • 24 Litre Capacity
  • USB port
  • Internal LED light
  • Storage compartment uses antimicrobial materials
  • Fold-flat variable position carry handle
Product Warranty: Outwell cooler boxes come with a two-year warranty.

Product Name: Kampa Sabrelink 30 Tent Light Starter Kit
Product Description:
Kampa SabreLink 30 Starter Kit Light System

Compact Tent Light LED Kit

The Kampa SabreLink 30 Starter Kit is a must-have for anyone who loves outdoor camping adventures. This innovative lighting system is designed to provide reliable and efficient illumination to your tent or caravan awning. The SabreLink 30 Starter Kit includes everything you need to set up a powerful lighting system in your tent, awning or caravan. Consisting of a bright LED light strip measuring 48cm and operated by remote control, this light kit provides the perfect amount of light needed for extended time in your tent or awning in the evenings. The Kampa SabreLink 30 is also incredibly easy to set up and use. The LED strip can be attached using the either the karabiner or Velcro strip for complete flexibility.

Multiple Power Options

The Kampa SabreLink 30 Start Kit can be powered by the 12V DC adaptor or via 230V AC supply with the UK plug adaptor, making is versatile for camping and outdoor activities. For added safety, the SabreLink LED light is weather-resistant, which will keep it protected from the elements, and the lights emit a warm and inviting glow that will create a cozy and inviting atmosphere in your outdoor space.

What's included in the kit?

  • 1 x 48cm low draw LED light bar
  • 1 x remote control and receiver
  • 1 x 230V AC UK plug adaptor with 5 metre cable
  • 1 x DC adaptor with 5 metre cable
  • 2 x carabiners
  • 1 x Velcro strip

Installation Manual

Product Description:
Navy Load Stainless Steel Single Hob Cooker With Left Hand Sink and Glass Lid NL.24001

For Marine and Campervan Use

Looking for a cracking hob and sink combination for your marine or campervan adventures? Look no further than the Navy Load NL.24000.  A right hand version is available NL.24000.

Stylish Design with High-Quality Finish

Its modern design will make this cooker combo blend seamlessly with any interior, while the glass lid offers a clean and elegant touch. The NL.24001 is perfect for campervan and Marine use, not only is it is it practical it really does look the business with its mirror polish finish and black toughened glass lid.

Safe and Efficient Cooking

Equipped with piezo ignition and a thermocouple safety device, the hob provides reliable and efficient cooking every time. You can enjoy your meals without worrying about gas leaks or other safety hazards.

Optional Pan Holder for Marine Use

For those using the Navy Load NL.24001 in a marine environment, an optional pan holder is available. This useful feature helps keep your pots and pans secure and stable.

Product Name: Kampa Touring Drive Away Awning Footprint Groundsheet
Product Description:
Kampa Touring Drive Away Awning Footprint

Drive Away Awning footprints add an extra layer of insulation and protection for your campervan awning. They keep the base of your awning clean and dry, making them easier to pack away and ensuring they last longer. They also help to insulate your awning, creating a barrier between the cold ground and your warm drive away awning.

In addition to its practical benefits, the Kampa Touring Footprint is also incredibly easy to use and transport. It is lightweight and compact, making it ideal for packing and transporting to your next camping destination. And when you're ready to set up camp, simply lay it out under your awning, secure it in place, and enjoy the added comfort and protection it provides.

Kampa awning groundsheet features:

  • Ultra-durable and waterproof polyethylene (PE)
  • Non-breathable reduces condensation
  • Includes carry bag
  • Designed to fit Kampa Dometic Touring Drive Away campervan awning and Hayling 4 tent
  • Lightweight - 2.4kg

Product Name: SunnCamp Inceptor Air Extreme 390 Caravan Awning
Product Description:
SunnCamp Inceptor Air Extreme 390 Caravan Awning

Utilising Sunncamp's Air Volution Single Inflation technology and tough 300D Pro-Tech fabric , the Inceptor Air Extreme range is a stunning caravan awning packed full of features to make every trip one to remember.  With removable front panels, zipped airflow panels and compatibility with the SunnCamp Air Annexe Plus, the Inceptor Air Extreme awning provides plenty of opportunities to maximise space and improve airflow on the warmest of days. 

Top of the line features

Not only does the Inceptor Air Extreme have a generous 325cm depth, but it also comes with multi-zip curtains, LED light pockets(for optional LED lights) and an external peggable mud wall for added weather protection. Plus, it is also compatible with both annexe and ApartAir, making it a versatile and adaptable option for any outdoor excursion.

One of the standout features of the Inceptor Air Extreme awning is its stunning panoramic views. Whether you're admiring the surrounding natural beauty or simply enjoying a relaxing evening in your outdoor haven, this awning provides the perfect setting to take in the breathtaking scenery. Overall, the Inceptor Air Extreme porch awnings are an exceptional choice for anyone seeking a high-quality, reliable, and stylish shelter for their outdoor adventures.

Key Features supplied with the SunnCamp Inceptor Air Extreme:

  • Air Volution Single Inflation system with pump and gauge
  • Draught skirt with ventilation panels
  • Curtains on all windows/Multi-zip curtains on front windows
  • 2 Air flow ventilation panels which zip in / out
  • Includes Veranda pole, storm buckles and straps
  • LED light pockets for optional LED light system
  • Removable front panels
  • Width 390cm
 The SunnCamp Inceptor Air Extreme Caravan Awning is to fit a caravan height of 235-250cm

Product Name: SunnCamp Swift Air Extreme Caravan Awning
Product Description:
SunnCamp Swift Air Extreme Caravan Awning

The SunnCamp Swift Air Extreme Caravan Awning is a game-changer in the world of caravan awnings. With its Air Volution Single Inflation technology and the robust 300D Pro-Tek fabric, the Swift Air Extreme provides an exceptional caravan awning ideal for short weekend breaks or long summer holidays. Being both a lightweight and easy-to-pitch inflatable awning that's perfect for those who want to add some extra living space to their caravan without the hassle of a traditional awning.

Simple pitching air inflation system

What makes the SunnCamp Swift Air Extreme stand out is its innovative Air Volution Single Inflation technology. Instead of traditional poles, the awning is supported by a series of inflatable tubes that can be easily inflated using the included pump with gauge. The Air Volution inflatable system means that the awning can be set up quickly and easily, without the need for a complicated pole system. 

Tough and Durable Construction

The SunnCamp Swift Air Extreme isn't just easy to pitch - it's also incredibly sturdy and durable. The single inflatable tubes are made from high-quality materials that are designed to withstand even the toughest weather conditions. The fabric of the awning is also specially treated to resist water and UV rays, ensuring that it stays looking great for years to come. 

Feature rich design

From the large roll up front door to side sun canopy compatibility, these awnings make staying cool in the hot summer sun a breeze. Zip curtains on all windows and air flow side doorways help regulate heat and keep you comfortable when resting outside your caravan. In addition to its innovative design and durability, the SunnCamp Swift Air Extreme also offers plenty of living space. With a generous footprint and high ceilings, it provides a comfortable and spacious area for relaxing, cooking, or dining. Once deflated and packed away in the storage bag, the small pack size means it takes up very little space in your caravan when not needed. 

Key Features of the SunnCamp Swift Air Extreme:

  • Air Volution Single Inflation system with pump and gauge
  • Draught skirt
  • Zip curtains on all windows
  • Multi-zip curtains on front main window
  • Air flow side doorways
  • LED light pockets for optional LED light system (1 x 325 Model, 3 x 390 model)
  • Buckle fit side sun canopy compatible
  • Optional roof lining and Pole Canopy Set Available
  • Awning depth of 240cm on both models

 The SunnCamp Swift Air Extreme Caravan Awning is to fit a caravan height of 235-250cm

Product Name: SunnCamp Swift Van 325 Motorhome Campervan Drive Away Awning
Product Description:
SunnCamp Swift Van 325 Drive Away Campervan Motorhome Awning

The SunnCamp Swift Van 325 Drive Away Awning is a marvel of convenience and functionality for any adventurous campervan owner. This awning provides an additional sheltered area that can be easily attached to your campervan or motorhome, providing you with a spacious outdoor living space.

Large Windows For A Spacious Feel

Manufactured with durable materials, the SunnCamp Swift Van 325 Drive Away Awning offers excellent protection in poor weather conditions with a generously sized living area. This motohome or campervan awning is designed with a sewn-in groundsheet to keep the interior dry and clean, even in wet weather. Additionally, the large windows and Airflow doorway panels provide ample light and ventilation, ensuring that the inside of the awning remains fresh and comfortable.

Easy To Pitch Design

The awning features an easy-to-pitch design, which makes it an ideal choice for novice campers who may not have much experience with setting up camp. The awning comes with pre-attached guylines and pegs, making it easy to pitch and secure. Furthermore, the awning is compact and lightweight, which means it is easy to transport and store when not in use.

Choice of Heights 

Available in either a Low or Tall version, but with a standard width of 325 cm, the SunnCamp Swift Van 325 Drive Away Awning provides plenty of space for you to relax, cook, or dine with your family and friends. Taking a journey out in your campervan or motorhome is easy as the awning has a versatile drive-away design that allows you to detach it from your van and leave it in place, giving you the freedom to explore your surroundings without having to pack up everything.

Overall, the SunnCamp Swift Van 325 Drive Away Awning is an excellent investment for van owners who love to camp and explore. Its quality construction, ease of use, and convenient design make it a top choice for anyone looking to enhance their outdoor experience.

Key Features of the SunnCamp Swift Van 325 Drive Away Awning:

  • Available in Low or Tall options to best suit your campervan or motorhome height
  • Wheelchair Access
  • Sewn in groundsheet design
  • Curtains on all windows
  • Air flow doorways
  • Tunnel privacy screen
  • Includes 1 x roof pole
  • Optional Pole Canopy Set Available

Product Description:
Vanshades Ford Custom Campervan Window Pod® A - Offside Fixed Window (Behind Driver)

The Vanshades Window Pod® thermal insulated blackout blind system is a stylish and practical addition to your Ford Custom campervan, whether you're just starting up or looking to retro fit, the Vanshades Window Pod® blinds are the ideal solution to get you on your way.

Vanshades Ford Custom Window Pod® comes pre-assembled with blackout and thermal blinds. Designed for exact positioning within a Ford Custom and ready for a quick and easy install, the Window Pod® blinds are available in multiple colours and comes pre-lined in Hi-Flex Smoke Velour Carpet for new and existing campervan conversions.

The Window Pod® system is available in various options to fit alongside fixed, aftermarket and OEM sliding windows inside your Ford Custom Campervan.

Window Pod A is specifically designed to be installed on the Offside position (Behind Driver) with a fixed window.

  • Raven

Easy to install and Stylish

Vanshades Window Pod® comes pre-assembled and pre-lined ready for a quick install into your Ford Custom campervan and has no visible fixings.

Window Pod® Thermal & Blackout Blinds!

Vanshades Window Pod® system has been designed specifically with your comfort and privacy in mind, with thermal and blackout features helping to keep you cool in the summer and warm in the winter whilst also maintaining a stylish and modern look throughout your Ford Custom!

Features:

  • Pre lined in Smoke Velour Carpet
  • Retains heat in winter
  • Helps to keep you cooler in the summer
  • Reduces condensation
  • Provides a thermal barrier

Product Description:
Heatek Stainless Steel Replacement Boiler Tank

6 Litre Stainless Steel Replacement Water Tank for a damaged Truma Therme TT2 tank

As an ideal replacement for a damaged Truma TT2 Therme tank in a motorhome or caravan, the latest Heatek boiler tank provides 6 litres of hot water storage, approximately 20% larger than the standard tank, as well as a stronger full Stainless Steel construction.

Lightweight yet strong

The stainless steel design is both compact and lightweight, making it easy to install in tight spaces. Perfect for installation in confined spaces such as a motorhome or caravan. Furthermore, the Heatek Stainless Steel boiler tank is constructed from durable material ensures at it can withstand extreme temperatures, best suited as a replacement to a damaged unit or as a precautionary action to prevent possible future ruptures due to risk of freezing.

Heatek Stainless Steel Replacement Boiler Tank Specifications

  • Ideal replacement for the Truma TT2 Therme Tank
  • Full Stainless Steel construction
  • Capacity: 6 litre (20% more than traditional tanks)
  • Weight: 1.1kg
  • Max pressure: 3.5 bar
  • Dimensions: 31.5cm x 17.3cm x 19.3cm
  • 100% recyclable

Product Name: Dimatec Touch Operated Nickel 12 Volt LED Caravan Motorhome Swivel Spot Light
Product Description:
Dimatec Touch Operated Nickel LED Caravan Motorhome Spot Light 

12V Campervan Swivel Spot Lights

The Dimatec Nickel LED Swivel Spotlight is the perfect touch operated LED spotlight for your campervan. This 12 volt swivel spotlight is ideal for turning your campervan, motorhome or caravan into a well lit space. With its satin nickel finish and LED technology, this spotlight is a stunning addition to any campervan. Made from high-quality materials and built to last, the Dimatec Touch Operated Nickel LED Swivel Spotlight is as durable as it is beautiful.

 

style="margin: 0px;"Its LED light emits a warm white glow at 4000K, perfect for your lighting needs. The Dimatec Touch Operated Nickel LED Swivel Spotlight features a rotating and angled head, so you can easily direct the light exactly where you need it. Ideal for reading, cooking, or creating ambient lighting. Its touch-sensitive control lets you switch on and off easily. This Touch Operated Swivel LED provides an aesthetic modern look to your caravan, campervan, motorhome, boat or horsebox. Get yours today!

 

Dimatec Spotlight Key Features:

  • Touch Operated Control: Easily turn the light on or off with touch controls.
  • Warm White Light (4000K): Provides a comfortable and inviting light that is perfect for lighting your mobile home.
  • Adjustable Lighting Angle: The spotlight head can be rotated and angled to exactly where you want it.
  • Sleek Satin Nickel Finish: The modern and stylish finish is an aesthetic feature to your campervan.
  • Power Consumption: This energy efficient swivel spot light operates at 12 volts.
  • Durable Design: Made with high-quality materials.
  • Easy Installation: Straightforward installation in your campervan, caravan or motorhome.

Product Name: VW T5 & T6 Campervan Tailgate Chair Pod
Product Description:
VW T5 & T6 Campervan Tailgate Chair Pod

The Vanshades Chair Pod is a compact and modern storage solution for your camping chairs, designed to fit onto the tailgate of your VW T5/T6 campervan or Kombi.

Making the most out of your space

By using the otherwise unutilized space at the back of your campervan, the Chair Pod ensures that your chairs are securely held in place behind the magnetic lid, preventing any rattling about during your journey.
The Chair Pod comes with two lightweight chairs, each weighing only 2.2kg and capable of supporting up to 100kg. The chairs can be easily removed from the Pod in seconds once the T5 & T6 tailgate is open, without the need for clips, straps, or buttons.

A Sleek Design and Easy Install

With its sleek design and light grey plastic finish that matches the VW trims on the pillars of the Transporter, the Chair Pod takes up as little as 80mm at the rear of the vehicle. It can be fully installed in just 20 minutes and is also available in black.
So whether you're heading out on a road trip or just enjoying a day out, the Vanshades Chair Pod lets you take comfort with you wherever you go, while keeping your VW T5/T6 campervan or Kombi clutter-free and organized

Please note: we do recommend upgrading your tailgate gas struts if your vehicle has gas struts which are less than 1250 newtons.

Product Name: Alpicool Adventurer 12v Portable Compressor Camping Fridge
Product Description:
Alpicool 12v Portable Camping Fridge

Robust transportable camping fridge 

Available in 19 or 24 litre options, the Alpicool Adventurer AD-RT camping fridges provides a sturdy and compact camping fridge ideal for weekend camping trips or as additional storage for longer holidays.

Equipped with a powerful compressor and advanced cooling technology, the RT20 can quickly cool your drinks and food to your desired temperature. With a choice of useful storage capacities, the Adventurer AD-RT fridges offer ample space to store all your essential foods or drinks, and its energy-efficient design ensures that you can use it for extended periods without worrying about draining your leisure battery.

Convenient portable storage solution

What sets the Alpicool RT20 fridge apart is its portability and convenience. The shockproof design and sturdy build handle the rough and tumble of camping life well. It features a sturdy set of carrying handles as well as the option to hang the fridge for increased flexibility. By adding the optional battery, the ability to extend cooling time away from power is increased meaning drinks and foodstuffs stay colder for longer.

Simple clear controls

The easy-to-use control panel allows you to set the temperature precisely, and the LED display lets you monitor the internal temperature at all times. With the option to operate the fridge in ECO or MAX mode to extend battery times or provide faster cooling respectively, this camping fridge is a great choice for those long, warm summer days! Furthermore, a 3 stage battery protection system prevents damage of the leisure battery that can occur from over discharging during operation.

Alpicool Adventurer AD-RT20 / AD-RT25 compressor camping fridge:

  • Choice of 19 or 24 litre models
  • 3 stage low battery protection
  • Anti-vibration design
  • Digital control panel and clear LED display
  • Fully insulated body
  • USB Charging Port
  • Low noise operation
  • 12V DC operation
  • Optional Battery available

User Manual
Product Warranty: 12 month warranty on all Adventurer fridges.
Product Availability: Fast delivery options available!

Product Description:
SunnCamp Caravan Awning Groundsheet

Keep your caravan awning area clean

These Sunncamp caravan awning footprints are designed specifically for the Swift, Ultima and Versara awning range. Once placed under the awning, it provides protection from dirt and moisture, helping to keep your awning and caravan cleaner.

Hardwearing yet easy to clean

Constructed of a durable and breathable fabric, the groundsheet will allow grass beneath to survive during extended periods. After use, the material can easily cleaned by simply wiping with a damp cloth and drying before storage. 

Light and compact size for storage

Packing down to a small size, the awning footprint comes with its own storage carry bag for easy storage and transportation. 

SunnCamp awning footprint - groundsheet features

  • Breathable - will not damage grass beneath
  • Easy to clean
  • Complete with carry bag
  • Choice of sizes for awning compatibility

Product Description:
Dometic Coolpower MPS 80 Mains Adaptor

The Dometic Coolpower MPS 80 Mains Adaptor is a great solution for connecting 24 volt cooling appliances to 110-240 volt mains systems.

Combining easy installation requirements and suitability for all Dometic Waeco cooling appliances that feature the Danfoss BD50/BD80 compressor, this mains adaptor is an ideal addition to your holiday set up. With clear battery connections, the Dometic Coolpower MPS 80 Mains Adaptor provides mains priority when permanently connected so that the unit can automatically switch to mains when it's detected and return to low voltage when hook up is lost or disconnected.

Please note that the Dometic Coolpower MPS 80 Mains Adaptor isn’t suitable for use with cooling appliances of a small to medium output.

Specifications:

  • Mains voltage: 110 - 240 volts
  • AC Output voltage: 28 volts
  • DC Output power: 252 watts
  • Battery voltage: 12/24 volts DC
  • Suitable for permanent installation
  • Works anywhere in the world
  • Supplied with a UK standard plug

Please note:  This is not suitable for the Dometic CRE range of fridges

Installation and Operation Manual
Product Availability: The Dometic Waeco MPS 80 Mains Adaptor is sent on a next working day carrier!

Easy pitch design and features

With an easy pitch AirFrame and lightweight construction, the Dometic Pro AIR Annexe is built to provide a stylish storage space with minimum fuss.  Featuring a mesh fly screen and zipper locker access, the Pro AIR Annexe is a complete annexe solution for a compatible Dometic awning.

Product Description:
Alpicool Adventurer AD65X 12v 24v Fridge for Caravan and Motorhome

Spacious 58 Litre LG compressor caravan and motorhome fridge

The Alpicool Adventurer AD65X fridge offers a spacious storage capacity of more than 58 liters and runs on 12/24v DC power. Designed specifically for caravan or motorhome users seeking a larger under counter compressor fridge solution.

Clear controls and digital display

With its user-friendly digital display and easy to use temperature controls, the Alpicool Adventurer AD65X compressor fridge ensures effortless setup and operation for caravan and motorhome users. With quiet operating noise and compact size, this fridge is an ideal addition to the kitchen area of your motorhome or campervan. Two cooling modes enable the best level of operation based on your needs.

Reversible door for added flexibility

To best suit the installation within your campervan or motorhome, the door can easily be reversed to a left/right hand opening for improved access and comfort. A secure central latch keeps the door shut during transit.

Alpicool Adventurer AD65X fridge freezer features:

  • High efficiency LG compressor
  • Digital temperature control with LED display
  • Reversible door
  • Door latch for added security during transportation
  • Available in black or silver
  • 58 Litre Capacity
  • Operates via 12v and 24v DC
Product Warranty: 12 month warranty on all Adventurer fridges.

SunnCamp Van Canopy 260 Campervan Awning

A compact and quick fit non-driveaway campervan awning

Whether you need some extra space for storing furniture or for sheltering from the sun, this lightweight Van Canopy 260 from SunnCamp is ideal for short breaks and weekends away. Using steel and fibreglass poles, this awning is also durable for your next camping adventurer.

Lightweight canopy awning

Designed to fit most rails and wind out canopies with the dual beading attachment of 4.2/6.2mm, this non-driveaway awning provides shelter with large windows for plenty of light and undisturbed views. Available in either a Low or Tall versions, rail heights between 185 to 200 cm or 250 to 265cm cover a wide range of vehicle heights. The small pack size also means it takes up very little space within your camper when not needed.

Product Name: Vitrifrigo VTR5060 DG 3-way LPG 12v 240v Compact Caravan Fridge
Product Description:
Vitrifrigo VTR5060 DG 3 Way Caravan LPG 240v 12v Wheel Arch Fridge Freezer

PLEASE NOTE: The Vitrifrigo VTR 5060 DG caravan fridge is a special order item and available with a 6-8 week lead time.

The Vitrifrigo VT5060 DG fridge is a compact 3-way gas and electric fridge that is suitable for most caravans and motorhomes to replace a Dometic RM 5310.

Fully featured fridge and freezer, 61 litres capacity.

The VTR5060 DG 3 way fridge from Vitrifrigo has 61 litres gross capacity, and is still able to operate on LPG butane / propane gas, 230V AC mains electric, and 12v DC leisure battery. The VTR5060 DG fridge has an electric thermostat and 3-position gas valve allowing the user to manual control the desired power source. The Vitrifrigo VTR5060 DG caravan fridge also features a reversible door allowing it to be opened on either a left or right hinge.

Dimensions similar to the Dometic RM 5310

The dimensions of the Vitrifrigo VTR5060 DG refrigerator mean it is now the nearest replacement in terms of size to the now discontinued Dometic RM 5310 wheel arch fridge installed in many small caravans. It may also serve as a replacement for those looking to replace the Dometic RM 5310 or equivalent with a 3-way gas model.

Vitrifrigo VTR5060 DG LPG Compact Caravan Fridge Dimensions

Whilst the Vitrifrigo VTR5060 DG is the nearest replacement for the Dometic RM 5310 caravan fridge in terms of dimensions and the wheel arch moulding, however it is vital you measure the space you have as they are not exactly the same:

  • Height: 615mm
  • Width: 485mm
  • Depth: 471mm

Vitrifrigo VTR5060 DG Caravan Fridge Specs

  • Fridge Capacity: 61.5 Litres
  • Freezer Capacity: 8.3 Litres
  • Power Source: LPG gas - 12V DC leisure battery - 230V AC mains electric
  • Reversible Door: Yes
  • Net weight: 28Kg
  • Typical energy consumption: 110W/h AC/DC - 19.1g/h LPG
  • All gas appliances must be fitted by a qualified gas engineer, failure to comply may affect your warranty.
Product Warranty: 24 Month Warranty on all Vitrifrigo fridges

Product Name: Vango Combi IR Double Burner and Grill Camping Cooker
Product Description:
Vango Combi IR Grill Cooker

Ideal for camping or al fresco dining

Pans shown in images NOT included

The Vango Combi IR Grill Cooker is a practical camping stove designed for campsite cooking. It features two 1.9KW stainless steel burners and a separate 0.6KW infrared grill. Combined, this cooker has a low fuel consumption whilst generating a hight heat output for efficient cooking. Each burner has individual heat controls and auto piezo ignition for easy lighting. Windshields are integrated to help reduce cooking times by providing protection from draughts and wind. The cooker includes a steel burner grate, a stainless steel drip tray, and anti-slip feet for stability. For portability and storage, it has a foldable frame with a carry handle and lid locks.

This cooker can be used with either propane or butane gas; however, please note that a regulator is not included

Vango Combi IR Grill Cooker features:

  • 2x easy clean 1.9KW stainless steel burners.
  • 0.6KW infrared grill ensures low fuel consumption whilst generating high heat output.
  • Built-in piezo ignition is simple and quick to light for each burner.
  • Each burner has its own control valve, allowing you to use different heat levels on each burner.
  • Steel burner grate to support your pots and pans.
  • Stainless steel drip tray.
  • Foldable frame with carry handle 
  • Lid locks keep the grill firmly closed when not in use or when stored.
  • Anti-slip feet.
  • Windshields help reduce cooking times by shielding from draughts and wind.
  • Can be used with either propane or butane. Regulator not included.

Vango Combi IR Grill Specification

  • Height: 13.5cm
  • Length: 57.0cm
  • Packsize: L 59.5cm x H 14.5cm x W 34.5cm
  • Width: 34.0cm
  • Weight: 3.87kg
Product Warranty: 2 year limited warranty on Vango cookers and stoves for added peace of mind

Product Description:
Vango Skye 300 3 Person Tunnel Tent

3 Person Lightweight Tent

The Vango Skye 300 tent is an easy to pitch, compact, three person poled tunnel tent. It is one of lightest poled tunnel tents within the Vango range and offers a spacious tent without excessive weight, perfect for your next camping trip. The Vango Skye tent features a side entry door and a spacious porch area perfect for storing muddy boots, furniture or camping kit. This three berth tunnel tent features Vango's Lights-Out bedroom which helps to block out early morning light giving a better great nights sleep on your camping trip. The Skye 300 is a perfect tent for smaller families or couples looking for a bit more space.

 

Vango Tent Provides A Bright Porch and Darkened Bedroom

With Crystal Clear Windows, a large entry door complete with anti-bug mesh, this Vango Skye 300 provides plenty of light within the porch area. The tunnel tent design offers a generous, comfortable space. Useful additions such as a lantern hanging point and storage pockets, make camping weekends or festivals that bit more comfy.

 

Vango Skye 300 Features:

  • Tunnel style tent for a spacious area without excessive weight
  • Powerflex fibreglass poles
  • Protex 3000mm Hydrostatic Head flysheet
  • Factory taped seams
  • Colour coded poles for easy pitching
  • Crystal clear windows
  • Lights-out bedrooms for improved sleeping
  • Inner storage pockets
  • TBS tension band system ensures tent performs well in adverse weather conditions
  • Lantern hanging points.
  • Linked-in groundsheet
  • Treetops Green colour flysheet

Product Description:
Vango Soul 300 3 Person Tunnel Tent

Quick pitching 3 Person Camping Tent

The Vango Soul 300 is a practical tunnel tent with a quick pitching time and small pack size making it ideal for first time campers, festival goers or backpacking campers. With lightweight Powerflex fibreglass poles and a high waterproof rated outer flysheet and robust groundsheet, this Vango tent provides a perfect tent for your next adventures no matter the weather.

 

Wide door and improved ventilation

The large opening flysheet door and part mesh inner door provides ventilation options for keeping condensation to a minimum. Although the pack size is small and weighs under 3 kgs, the Vango Soul 300 can comfortably sleep 3 people. The small porch area is a perfect store for muddy boots, backpacks or small items of camping kit. This three berth tunnel tent features Vango's Lights-Out bedroom which helps to block out early morning light giving a better great nights sleep on your camping trip. The Soul 300 is a perfect tent for couples looking for a bit more space.

 

Vango Soul 300 Features:

  • Tunnel style tent for a spacious sleeping area without excessive weight
  • Powerflex fibreglass poles
  • Protex 70 Denier 3000mm Hydrostatic Head flysheet
  • Factory taped seams
  • Colour coded poles for easy pitching
  • Part mesh inner door
  • Lights-out bedrooms for improved sleeping
  • Fully rain and wind tested
  • Waterproof PE Groundsheet
  • Lantern hanging points.
  • High visibility guy lines and reflective webbing

Product Name: Dometic Freshjet FJX4 2200 Motorhome Caravan Air Conditioner
Product Description:
Dometic Freshjet FJX4 2200 Motorhome Caravan Air Conditioner

Stay cool and comfortable on your next caravaning trip with the Dometic FreshJet FJX4 2200 motorhome air conditioner! This powerful yet quiet air conditioner is perfect for caravans, campervans, and motorhomes up to 7 meters long. It will quickly cool down your RV on even the hottest days, without keeping you awake through the night! The Dometic FreshJet FJX4 2200 air con boasts a built-in clean air system. This innovative Dometic feature removes allergens, mold, and unpleasant odors from your motorhomes air, ensuring you breathe fresh and healthy air throughout your trip.

This Dometic FJX4 2200 air conditioner isn't just for cooling! It also features a heating function to keep you warm on those chilly nights. The Dometic FreshJet FJX4 2200 boasts a modern, low-profile diffuser that fits neatly on your RV's roof, maximizing headroom inside your caravan or motorhome.

The digital display allows you to easily set the desired temperature and fan speed. Built-in warm white LED lights add a touch of ambiance to your motorhomes or campervans interior. Adjustable air vents let you direct cool air wherever you need it, and a reusable filter keeps dust at bay for easy cleaning.

Superior cooling performance

Improved interior cooling with reduced power consumption make this air conditioning unit from Dometic a smart choice for motorhome, caravan or campervan owners looking to keep cool when the temperature rises. Controlling the Freshjet FJX4 air conditioner is easy with the included remote control. Smart connectivity is also possible with the Dometic smartphone app.

Dometic Freshjet FJX4 2200 Air Con Features;

  • Superior cooling performance – the cabin is cooled down in record time
  • Quieter than other roof air conditioners available in the market
  • Superior energy efficiency – reduced power consumption
  • CleanAir air purifier system – keeps your motorhome smelling fresh and clean
  • Remote control included as standard.
  • Smart connectivity options – compatible with Dometic smart phone app and premium wall thermostat
  • Air distribution box with touch control panel and integrated ambient light 

 

Dometic Freshjet FJX4 2200 Air Con Installation Manual

Dometic Freshjet FJX4 2200 Air Con Operating Manual

 

This product must be installed by a Dometic approved installer, to not do so will affect the warranty on the product.

Product Description:
Outwell Annatto 2 Burner Camping Stove

The Outwell Annatto camping stove offers a flexible family stove capable of cooking up quality meals and is suitable for use with larger pots due to the wide pot stand top. The folding lid and side windshields provide protection on windy days camping or if used as a mobile stove on days out and about. 

Simple gas cartridge cooking

Using a standardised EN417 (7/16 in thread) regulator and braided hose connection, the Outwell Annatto makes mobile cooking easy and takes up very little space when not needed. The compact stove, complete dual gas controls and piezo ignition system allows perfect control of gas flow and ignition without the need for matches or lighters. The two 3.5kw burners provide great cooking power when needed most.

Easy to clean and use

With an easy to clean surface and removable pan grate, the Outwell Annatto stove makes post camp cooking cleanup easy each and every time.

Stable anti-slip base

Grippy anti-slip feet keep mealtimes as safe as possible and is ideal for use on camping tables, picnic benches and worktops. Once mealtime is over and the stove has cooled down, the Outwell Annatto stove packs away within seconds. 

Outwell Annatto stove features:

  • Compact sized camping cooker
  • Stainless steel construction
  • Rear lid and side windshields
  • Once touch piezo ignition
  • Removable burner grate
  • Powerful 3.5kw dual burners
  • Braided hose and regulator included
  • Colour: Silver Grey
  • Weight: 4.3kg
  • Pack Dimensions: 54 x 31 x 10cm

Product Description:
Outwell Windscreen Air Scalable Camping Windbreak

Lightweight inflatable windscreen

The Outwell Windscreen Air is a flexible modular windbreaker system that provides a choice of configurations to best suit your camping needs. The Windscreen Air Scalable 150 and 180 can be used independently as standalone windbreakers or can be connected to increase the protected area alongside your caravan, motorhome, campervan or tent. The 180 model has angled lookout window panels for improved visibility.

Quick and easy pitching air windscreen

Utilising Outwells Rigid Air System, these camping windscreens can be quickly inflated or deflated, and the individual tubes with incorporated external valves, make pitching simple. Whether used alone as a single two panel set or as part of a modular set up, these windbreakers offer ample privacy in and around your camping pitch and have the flexibility to best suit your needs. Adjustable pegging points, strong luminous guylines for improved visibility and sturdiness, and side zips for modular connection make this a windscreen solution ideal for your next camping holiday.

Tough fabric with taped seams

Outtex 3000 Select fabric is hardwearing and waterproof for added peace of mind. Each Outwell Windscreen Air Scalable windbreaker comes complete with a carrybag and air pump as standard.

Outwell Windscreen Air Scalable features:

  • Modular design
  • Outtex 3000 Select fabric
  • Taped Seams
  • Outwell Rigid Air System tubes for reliable use
  • Air pump and carrybag included
  • Luminous guy lines with pegs
  • Black and Grey colour

Product Description:
Fiamma DJ Ford Transit Bike Rack 2014 Onwards

Please note: we cannot accept returns on bike racks. Please ensure this item is compatible with your vehicle before purchasing.

This updated Fiamma Carry-Bike is designed for the Ford Transit Mk 8 campervan and motorhome and comes in a choice of Deep Black or Anodised Aluminium colour. The robust aluminium 2 bike rack carrier is designed for vehicles with double back doors. You can still access the back doors safely while the bikes are still attached. The new version of the Fiamma DJ bike holder allows the installation of safety support rails in three different positions making the loading of bikes easier. Fixing brackets included.

The license plate must not be obstructed from view when the Fiamma DJ Bike Rack is used, so an appropriate license plate holder may be required.

Choice of colour finish

The Fiamma DJ Ford Transit Bike Rack is available in either Anodised Aluminium or Deep Black finish.

Product Name: ReVace Campervan Awning Rail With LED Option
Product Description:
ReVace Campervan Awning Rail With Optional LED Strip

High-quality awning rail for a range of campervan models

The innovative ReVace Awning Rail has been specifically designed to provide a functional and attractive awning rail to enhance your campervan with a multitude of features. The awning rail functionality is complemented by a sleek design, hassle-free installation and comprehensive fitting instructions included in the kit.

Available as a standard campervan awning rail or with an integrated LED light strip, the later version can provide a warm glow beneath your awning, perfect for easily navigating your campervan after sunset or for providing relaxing ambient lighting. Even when your awning is not in use, the light strip is excellent for providing lighting in the area outside of your vehicle. Say goodbye to fumbling in the darkness outside your van with a headlamp or torch.

Robust construction

Constructed from strong yet lightweight aluminium, this awning rail has a complete length of 2650mm and is available in black. The rail comes complete with tapered end caps, threaded hangers and fixing adhesive. The LED version comes with an 2200mm pre-fitted LED strip and a 3m power cable, inline fuse and fuse holder. 

ReVace Campervan Awning Rail Features:

  • Awning rail compatible with 4mm or 6mm flange/kador strip
  • 2650mm aluminium awning rail
  • 2 x flexible end caps
  • 2 x threaded hangers
  • Fixing adhesive

Optional LED Kit includes:

  • 2200mm waterproof LED strip pre-fitted to awning
  • Inline fuse, fuse holder, 20mm LED light switch and crimps
  • 3m power cable

This kit does NOT include the sealant - we recommend Sikaflex 221, as highlighted in the related products list.

Product Description:
Vango Shangri-La II Self Inflating Mattress

Comfortable Camping With Vango Shangri-La II Self Inflating Mats

The Vango Shangri-La II sleeping mats offer a choice of mattresses widths and heights providing the best possible nights sleep when camping. Using Vango's Core Cutting Construction, a more compact pack size does not compromise comfort. With fast inflation and deflation with the Cyclone Valve, and precision engineered construction and premium materials, a good nights sleep is all but guaranteed with the Shangri-La II mats. The mattress boasts vertical sides that provide a flat, even sleeping surface, and the exceptionally soft stretch fabric guarantees a luxurious rest.

Choice of sizes

The Shangri-La II sleeping mattress is available in a combination of sizes. Choose from two widths, Grande 76cm or Double 132cm, and three depths 10, 15 or 20cm (Grande only). Pick the best one for your camping needs.

Compact size for easy storage.

With the compression strapped storage bag and respectable pack sizes, the Vango Shangri-La II is ideal for tent campers, campervan owners or caravan and motorhome users with unexpecting guests. 

Vango Shangri-La II Mattress Features:

  • Cyclone Valve for easy inflation/deflation
  • Vango Core Cutting Construction
  • Elastic Fabric for improved comfort
  • Choice of mattress widths and depths
  • TPU Lamination Technology for a lighter quick inflation
  • Carry bag with compression straps

Product Description:
Outwell Perce Black Camping Chair

Sturdy folding camping chair

With a steel frame and 100% polyester fabric seat, the Outwell Perce chair provides a comfortable and strong camping chair, perfect for sitting in the sun around your tent or for chilling late into the evening besides your camper van.

Easy to carry

The Outwell Perce camp chair, complete with the detachable carry strap makes transportation easy. So whether you're heading out for a picnic or need some extra seats for a barbeque with friends, the Perce Chair provides comfort and style in abundance. The padded arm rest and oversized feet ensure a stable chair for extended hours of use even on rough camp fields or sandy beaches.

Strong yet compact

Built with a sturdy steel frame, this chair folds flat within seconds and the tough polyester fabric will take on the rigours of camping life without problems.

Outwell Perce Camping Chair Features

  • 100% Polyester
  • Lightweight steel construction
  • Carry strap included
  • Seat height - 43cm
  • Maximum load - 125kg
  • Weight - 4.4kg

Product Description:
Vango Kanto Quad Sleeping Bags

Comfortable 2 Season Camping Sleeping Bag

With a cosy and comfortable Polair brushed fabric, and horizontal stitching to keep internal insulation in place, the Vango Kanto Quad Sleeping Bag provides a comfy sleeping experience, perfect for late spring and summer camping. To help air out the sleeping bag after use or following washing once your camping trip is over, the bag comes with loops for easy hanging.

Sleeping Bag With Integrated Headrest

The Vango Kanto Quad sleeping bag includes an integrated headrest for comfort and a hollow fibre filling that provides warmth without the bulk. A generous "quad" square shaped bag with hooded top incorporates a two-way zip for flexible zipper options to get comfy after a busy day camping. The zip guard and zipper baffle helps to keep the zip closure running smoothly and helps to keep drafts out. Available in either single or double sizes, the Vango Kanto Quad sleeping bag makes for an ideal summer camping or campervan sleeping bag.

Vango Kanto Quad Sleeping Bag Specifications

Single 

  • Filling: 60% Single Hole Siliconised Hollow Fibre / 40% Polyester
  • Zipper: Auto Lock, 2 Way Zip
  • External Size (LxW): 215 x 80cm
  • Body Length: 190cm
  • Pack Size: 41 x 24cm
  • Weight: 1.8kg
  • Colour: Mineral Green or Arctic Dusk
  • Temperature Rating (Comfort): 9°C
  • Temperature Rating (Limit): 4°C
  • Temperature Rating (Extreme): -10°C
  • Rating: 2 Season

Double 

  • Filling: 60% Single Hole Siliconised Hollow Fibre / 40% Polyester
  • Zipper: Auto Lock, 2 Way Zip
  • External Size (LxW): 215 x 150cm
  • Body Length: 190cm
  • Pack Size: 54 x 29cm
  • Weight: 3.6kg
  • Colour: Mineral Green
  • Temperature Rating (Comfort): 10°C
  • Temperature Rating (Limit): 7°C
  • Temperature Rating (Extreme): -7°C
  • Rating: 2 Season
Product Warranty: All Vango products are designed and manufactured to exacting standards.  As such, Vango are proud to offer a category leading two year user warranty. The warranty covers any manufacturing faults within the fabrics, component parts or workmanship.

Product Description:
Outwell Akira 300 Power Station: For Your Off-Grid Adventures

Imagine waking up to a fresh cup of coffee brewed with your electric kettle, even though you're miles from the nearest power outlet. Or maybe you want to keep your campsite lights on all night long, so you can enjoy a campfire with friends without having to worry about running out of batteries. With the Outwell Akira 300 Power Station, you can do all of this and more.

The Akira 300 is a lightweight and portable power station that is perfect for camping trips of all lengths. It has a variety of ports, including USB, USB-C, and AC, so you can charge all of your devices, from your phone to your laptop. It also has a built-in flashlight and a solar panel charging option, so you can stay powered even when you're off the grid.

Here are just a few of the ways you can use the Akira 300 Power Station on your next camping trip:

  •     Charge your phone, laptop, and other devices so you can stay connected and entertained.
  •     Power your campsite lights and appliances, such as coolers, electric skillets, and griddles.
  •     Cook meals with an electric skillet or griddle, even if you don't have access to a campfire.
  •     Keep your food and drinks cold with a cooler.
  •     Stay safe with a built-in flashlight.

The Akira 300 Power Station is the perfect way to make your camping trip more comfortable and enjoyable. With it, you can have all the power you need, no matter where you are.

Features:

  •     2x USB-A ports
  •     1x USB-C port
  •     1x AC outlet
  •     Built-in flashlight
  •     Solar panel charging option (optional)
  •     Lightweight and portable (3.3kg)
  •     Can be charged from car, wall outlet or solar panel (built-in MPPT controller)

Technical Specifications:

  •     Battery: 10.8V 26Ah (281Wh) Li-ion battery
  •     AC output: 220V pure sine wave inverter, max 300W continuous, 450W peak
  •     DC output: 3x DC 10.8V out, max 150W total
  •     USB output: 1x USB-C PD 60W in/out, 1x USB-A QC 3.0 5V/9V max 18W, 2x USB-A 5V max 12W
  •     Input: DC 12-30V max 100W

    App. charging times from 0-100%:

  •     AC adaptor: 4-6 hours
  •     Car charger 12V DC: 2-3 hours
  •     USB-C/PD: 5-7 hours
  •     Solar (120W panel - optional): 3-8 hours depending on weather

Product Description:
Outwell Akira 600 Power Station: Your portable power companion for motorhome and camping adventures

The Outwell Akira 600 Power Station is the perfect way to make your camping trip more comfortable and enjoyable, with even more power and versatility than the Akira 300. With its larger battery capacity and multiple output ports, the Outwell Akira 600 can power a wider range of devices and keep them running for longer.

Here are just a few of the things you can do with the Outwell Akira 600 Power Station:

  •     Power your campsite lights, fridge, and entertainment system.
  •     Charge your electronic devices, such as laptops, tablets, smartphones, and cameras.
  •     Power your electric air pump to inflate your air mattresses and other inflatable gear.
  •     Operate your electric cooler to keep your drinks and snacks cool and refreshing.
  •     Use the Akira 600 as a backup power source in case of a power outage.

The Akira 600 is also ideal for powering other outdoor activities, such as fishing, hiking, barbecues and more. It's also a great choice for emergency preparedness incase of a power outage.

Features:

  • Powerful lithium-ion battery (626 Wh): Can power a variety of devices, including laptops, tablets, smartphones, and even small appliances.
  • Versatile charging options: Can be charged from AC, DC, and solar power.
  • Multiple output ports: 1x AC, 3x DC, 1x USB-C/PD, 1x USB-A QC 3.0, and 3x USB-A.
  • Lightweight and portable: Easy to carry with you on outdoor adventures.
  • Safe and easy to use: Built-in safety features protect against overcharging, over discharging, and short circuits
  • Built-in flashlight: Provides emergency lighting when needed.

Product Description:
Crusader Black & Grey Motorhome CoverPro

Protective Weatherproof Motorhome Cover

With six sizes to fit most motorhome vehicles, this functional black and grey cover provides a great fit to your motorhome. The CoverPro offers a waterproof barrier to motorhomes from 5.7 metres to 8 metres in length. Designed with a robust multi layer system featuring non woven polypropylene fabric, the CoverPro allows breathability to prevent a build up of damp and water ingress. In addition to providing waterproof protection, the cover also helps prevent unsightly dirt, water marks and birdlime during extended storage.

Accessibility During Winter Storage

For added convenience, the Crusader Motorhome CoverPro comes complete with high level zips on both driver and passenger side allowing access to your motorhome. This feature provides accessibility to the interior of the motorhome when changing damp reducing crystals or simply for preparing your motorhome prior to your next holiday or weekend break. When the cover is not required, it can be easily stored in the storage bag included.

Breathable Cover

The breathable 4-ply layered design of this motorhome cover allows moisture that may accumulate under the cover to evaporate and escape from the surface, helping to prevent mould growth. the material is also UV stable for added peace of mind. Adjustable straps on all four sides of the motorhome enable a secure, customised fit to reduce movement in strong winds.

Please note - For motorhomes with cab humps it is recommended to go up one size. Also for motorhomes with aerials, satellite equipment or any other ancillary items, that may cause a snag on the cover, it is recommended to cover the equipment with a box or similar protective item. It may be necessary to size up in order to have extra material to cover roof mounted items.

Specifications

  • Packsize cm (H x W x D): 58 x 50 x 50cm

Product Name: AAP.Tron 12V Pure Sine Wave Inverter UK Socket
Product Description:
Introducing the AAP.Tron Pure Sine Wave Inverters

The ASP range of pure sine wave inverters is a state-of-the-art series of inverters that offer a wide range of features and benefits. They are designed to convert DC power from batteries to AC power that can be used to power a variety of electrical devices, including sensitive equipment such as computers, medical devices, and audio equipment.

The power inverter has outstanding protection including input DC polarity reversed protection, input DC over/under voltage protection, internal over temperature protection, overload protection and output short circuit protection.

Staying Connected

Equipped with an RS232 communication port, monitoring the status of your power inverter has never been easier. Stay in control and stay informed about your power usage and performance.
Why Choose AAP.Tron Pure Sine Wave Inverters?

  • Clean power output: AAP.Tron pure sine wave inverters produce a clean, smooth sine wave output that is identical to the power that comes from your wall outlet. This makes them ideal for powering sensitive electronic equipment (eg microwaves)
  • Efficiency: AAP.Tron pure sine wave inverters are very efficient at converting DC power to AC power. This means that you will get more power out of your battery bank, and your inverter will run cooler.
  • Reliability: AAP.Tron pure sine wave inverters are built with high-quality components and are designed to withstand the rigors of real-world use. They are backed by a one-year warranty, so you can be confident that your inverter will last for many years to come.

Versatile Applications, Trusted Performance

Overall, AAP.Tron pure sine wave inverters are a great choice for anyone who needs a reliable and efficient way to convert DC power to AC power. They are ideal for a variety of applications, including RVs, campers, marine and off-grid homes and cabins.

If you are looking for a high-quality, reliable, and efficient pure sine wave inverter, the ASP range is a great option

Product Description:
Vango Kanto Single Camping Sleeping Bag

Spacious 2 Season Summer Sleeping Bag

The Vango Kanto Single square sleeping bag offers a roomy, cosy and comfortable sleep on your next camping holiday thanks to the Polair brushed fabric, horizontal stitching to keep the fibre filling in place and spacious design. The integrated headrest helps promote a restful night after an active day on the camp field or following adventures in your campervan or motorhome.

Lightweight yet warm camping sleep bag

Packing for summer camping trips shouldn't mean bulky, heavy equipment. Thanks to the light weight and small pack size of the Vango Kanto Single sleeping bag, a comfortable sleep is possible without the taking up too much space in your boot, campervan or caravan. The polyester fill sleeping bag weighs a mere 1.6kg making it easy to store when not needed. The square shaped bag provides extra space for campers that dislike the mummy style sleeping bags and enjoy some additional room when sleeping. The auto-lock two way zip ensures smooth zipper closure and helps to control heat on warmer summer nights.

Vango Kanto Single Sleeping Bag Specifications

  • Filling: 30% Single Hole Siliconised Hollow Fibre / 70% Polyester
  • Zipper: Auto Lock, 2 Way Zip
  • External Size (LxW): 215 x 80cm
  • Body Length: 190cm

  • Colour: Mineral Green/Arctic Dusk/Black

  • Temperature Rating (Limit): 7°C

Product Description:
Alpicool Adventurer ADR40 37 Litre 12v 24v Motorhome and Campervan Fridge 

Compact LG Powered Compressor Campervan Fridge

This practical 37 litre fridge, a perfect size for campervan or motorhomes with limited kitchen space, uses the highly efficient LG compressor with reliable performance for keeping chilled food stored safely. The compact, undercounter design enables the fridge to be installed discreetly whilst still providing useful storage capacity for a fridge of this size. Even with its diminutive size, the ADR40 is still packed with features including a three stage battery protect system, quiet operation and clear display.

This Alpicool ADR40 compressor fridge provides easily installation even in compact or unusual campervan layouts. A simple, clean looking LED display and uncomplicated controls make operating this fridge straight forward and hassle-free. To maximise the 37 litre capacity, it is possible to remove the salad drawer and shelf. Especially useful for storing larger items. The door also features a storage lock to help vent the fridge when not in use.

Choice of door colours

With the option of a Silver or Black door finish, the Alpicool Adventurer ADR40 compressor fridge is available in colours to suit most motorhome or campervan interiors.

Alpicool Adventurer ADR40 Fridge Freezer Features:

  • High efficiency LG compressor
  • Reversible door
  • Brushed effect black or silver panel
  • 37 Litre Capacity
  • 12v or 24v DC
  • Perfect for campervan, motorhome and marine installations

Alpicool Adventurer ADR50 50 Litre 12v 24v Motorhome and Campervan Fridge 

LG Compressor Fridge Freezer Ideal For Motorhome or Campervan

With a practical 50 litre capacity, the Alpicool Adventurer ADR50 provides a useful and compact fridge perfect for campervan or motorhomes kitchens with limited installation space. Powered by the highly efficient LG compressor, the ADR50 fridge operates quietly yet still provides impressive chilling performance. The discreet dimensions of this undercounter fridge allow it to be installed within small kitchen areas often found in motorhome or campervans. Despite the size of this compact fridge, it still provides a generous storage space perfect for short breaks or extended holidays away.

Easy to Use Fridge Controls

Thanks to a clear and concise LED display and simple controls, the ADR50 allows direct user control over the operation of the fridge freezer. To minimise the risk of depletion of battery power through excessive use, the fridge also has a three stage battery protection system to automatically prevent potentially damaging discharge of your leisure battery.

Available in Two Colour Choices

For improved compatibility with the interior of most campervans or motorhomes, the ADR50 fridge freezer can be purchased in either a black or silver colour finish. Simply choose your preferred colour option above.

Alpicool Adventurer ADR50 Fridge Freezer Features:

  • High efficiency LG compressor
  • LED display
  • Digital temperature control 
  • Brushed effect black or silver panel
  • Removable door bins
  • 50 Litre Capacity 12v or 24v DC
  • Perfect for campervan motorhome and marine use

LG Compressor 90 Litre Motorhome and Caravan Fridge

Product Name: Crusader Caravan Front Cover With LED Lights
Product Description:
Crusader Caravan Front Cover With LED Lights

Protective Front Caravan Cover

Prevent damage to the front of your caravan from dirt, bugs or potential chipping from stones during journeys with this Crusader Caravan Front Cover. This front only cover is designed to keep your caravan clean during towing. For increased road visibility the cover includes reflective strips and two battery operated LED lights incorporated in the front to further enhance road safety.

Breathable 4 Layer Fabric

Constructed from a 4 layer, waterproof and breathable fabric, this front caravan cover also features a soft, scratch resistant inner layer to help prevent damage to the caravan exterior during fitting. The two-tone grey colour front cover is compatible with a range of caravan makes and models.

Easy Fitting On A Range Of Sizes

Devised to fit caravans with widths of between 215 to 250cm, this Crusader Caravan Front Cover, is compatible with various caravans on the market. Fitting is easy with 8 adjustable straps attached to awning insertion tubes for fixing to the awning rail on each side. An additional hitch strap is provided for extra stability and security.

Please note that when using a front cover for towing, you must ensure it doesn't obstruct the caravan's lights, especially the front marker lights, which are a legal requirement. The Crusader Front Caravan Cover is compliant with road regulations in this regard.

Crusader Caravan Front Cover Specifications

  • Adjustable size fitting caravan widths of 215-250cm
  • 8 straps per side for a secure fit
  • Full installation instructions included
  • Battery Operated LEDs for added road safety
  • Reflective Strips
  • Breathable, waterproof 4 layer fabric
  • Carry bag included for convenient storage

Product Name: Maxview Roam Campervan 3G 4G WiFi System With 5G Ready Antenna
Product Description:
Maxview Roam Campervan 3G/4G WiFi System Router With 5G Ready Antenna

Campervan specific WiFi Router

With a smaller overall size and reduced footprint, the Maxview Roam Campervan WiFi system is ideal for campervan or van conversion owners looking for a WiFi solution without losing vital roof space. The small roof mounted omni-directional antenna is suitable for most campervans or panel vans conversions and can fit between the ridges of most ridged roof vans on the market. Campervans with a pop-top roof design can also utilise the Maxview Roam Campervan Router as the antenna weighs only 385g.

Plug and Play Router

The compact router, complete with a durable anti-vibration aluminium housing, can easily be discreetly mounted in a cupboard or similar area whilst still providing exceptional performance so you can stream films or programs, video call or send work emails effortlessly  from the comfort of your campervan or motorhome. The router boasts two ethernet ports providing direct links to laptops and other devices. The Maxview Roam Campervan Router is Android and iOS app compatible for fingertip control, making use even easier. The app lets you monitor and configure your WiFi connection. 

Unlocked for any SIM

As standard the Maxview Roam Campervan 3G/4G Wifi Router is designed for operation with any data service provider for full flexibility depending upon your needs and location. The router can also support up to 50 different devices including smart TVs, smartphones, laptops or similar devices, perfect for WiFi dependant family members.

Maxview Roam Campervan 3G/4G WiFi Router features:

  • Lightweight and streamlined campervan specific antenna (5G ready)
  • Small but powerful router
  • Aluminium router casing with anti-vibration mounting
  • Two ethernet ports for stable wired laptop connection
  • Compatible with current 3G and 4G technology (when used a suitable SIM card)
  • Runs on 12v
  • Suitable for roaming & European travel (when used with suitable SIM card)

Maxview Roam contents:

  • Omnidirectional thin roof-mount antenna
  • 0.3m antenna cable with SMA connectors
  • 2m extension cable included
  • WiFi router antenna (Choice of white or black)
  • 12v cigarette power supply
  • Router mounting kit
  • 1.5m ethernet cable
  • Instructions

Product Name: Maxview Roam / Roam X Combo 4G WiFi System With TV Aerial
Product Description:
Maxview Roam / Roam X Combo WiFi And TV Aerial Kit

Combined WiFi Antenna With TV Aerial

For added digital entertainment options, the Maxview Roam Combo kit consists of an integrated WiFi antenna with a terrestrial TV aerial. This allows you to choose from terrestrial TV programmes or streaming data via the 4G (5G ready) antenna and router unit. The antenna has been specifically designed with caravan, campervan and motorhome users in mind to provide improved reception in remote and rural locations. The combo antenna also utilises an omni-directional receiver to eliminate the need for manual adjustments. 

TV Signal Booster

Included in the set is a Variable Signal Booster complete with adjustable gain control for perfect picture image in various signal strength areas. The signal booster has two aerial outputs to enable positioning of TV's at separate areas of your caravan, motorhome or campervan. Combine this booster with a compact 'plug and play' 3G/4G WiFi router and robust anti-vibration aluminium housing bracket for perfect on the move entertainment and mobile data access. The discreet size and easy mounting kit allows this router to be installed inside a cupboard, along a corridor or similar area. There are two 4G Router models available each offering a choice single or dual SIM card ports, data data transfer speeds and available ethernet ports.

Whats the Difference between the Roam and the Roam X?

The Roam X boasts a CAT6 router, capable of blazing-fast download speeds of up to 300 Mbps, double that of the Roam's CAT4 router. Additionally, it excels at supporting multiple heavy users simultaneously, ideal for busy families or groups.

Complete Kit

The Maxview Roam or Roam X Combo WiFi and Aerial kit includes all the standard fixings, power supplies and brackets required for easy installation. Also, operating the router is simple with the free smartphone application available for Android and iOS compatible phones. The app allows you to monitor data usage, current status, connection settings as well as password control and other key settings.

Maxview Roam / Roam X Combo key features:

  • Compact 4G (5G Ready) antenna with inbuilt omni-directional TV aerial
  • Choice of white or grey aerial
  • Choice of router with a choice of data speeds, SIM ports and ethernet ports
  • Aluminium router casing with anti-vibration mounting
  • Ethernet ports for stable wired laptop, smartv or device connection
  • Compatible with current 3G and 4G technology (when used a suitable SIM card)
  • Runs on 12v
  • Variable Signal Booster for improved TV viewing

Maxview Roam / Roam X contents:

  • Omnidirectional roof-mount antenna/aerial
  • 4G WiFi router
  • Router mounting kit
  • TV Signal Booster
  • 12v cigarette power supply for router
  • 12v Power Supply with fused cable for TV Signal Booster
  • 1.5m ethernet cable
  • Instructions

Product Name: Maxview Gazelle Pro Mk II TV Aerial
Product Description:
Maxview Gazelle Pro Mk 2 TV Aerial

Campervan Motorhome Caravan TV Aerial

The Maxview Gazelle Pro TV aerial offers great terrestrial TV reception, perfect for watching your favourite programs on the move. The Gazelle Pro Mk 2 features a 360° omni-directional aerial specifically designed for use by caravan, campervan, motorhome or canal boat users, and does not require any manual adjustment to the aerial once installed. The compact aerial size and small footprint requires only a small amount of roof space for effective installation without impacting upon reception quality in remote and rural locations. 

Adjustable TV Signal Booster

To further enhance the power of the omni-directional aerial, Maxview have included a Variable Signal Booster complete with adjustable gain control for picture perfect image quality, even in areas of varying signal strength. With dual coaxial outputs providing signal to two separate TV's within your caravan, motorhome or campervan, there should be no more disagreements on what to watch. The discreet size and easy mounting of the signal booster can easily be installed inside a cupboard or similar space.

Maxview Gazelle Pro Mk 2 key features:

  • Compact omni-directional TV aerial available in either dark grey or white colour
  • Small footprint requiring minimal roof space
  • Suitable for caravan, motorhome, campervan, truck or canal boat use
  • Variable Signal Booster for improved TV viewing
  • Dual coaxial outputs on signal booster
  • Easy installation

Maxview Gazelle Pro contents:

  • Omnidirectional roof-mount aerial
  • Mounting foot, seal and integrated coaxial cable (5m)
  • Clamping tool
  • TV Signal Booster with dual coaxial outputs
  • 12v Power Supply with fused cable for TV Signal Booster
  • 1 metre F to coaxial flylead
  • Roof mounting kit and fixings

Product Name: Maxview Roam 5G Combo WiFi System With TV Aerial
Product Description:
Maxview Roam 5G WiFi And TV Aerial Combo Kit

Powerful 5G Router With Integrated WiFi Antenna And TV Aerial

This omni-directional antenna harnesses the future-proof technology of 5G reception with UHF TV signal for a complete digital entertainment package. With a simple roof mounting foot plate, taking up a limited amount of vital roof space, this Roam 5G Combo kit brings WiFi and terrestrial TV to your caravan, motorhome or campervan. The 4G/5G router offers WiFi connectivity to existing WiFi networks saving your 4/5G data for times you are in remote or rural destinations.

Plug and Play Router

Housed inside aluminium for lightweight and strength, the 4/5G router in protected from damaging vibrations thanks to the specifically designed anti-vibration bracket bringing peace of mind during your travels. The discreet router is simple to set up and offers a plug and play approach to installation enabling it to be stored away inside a cupboard, facia or other location. The router also provides two SIM card ports and is powerful enough to connect to up to 150 separate devices. For improved connection to vital devices, there are 5 ethernet ports with RJ45 connections.

Complete Entertainment

Being away from home does not mean being away from a choice of entertainment. From terrestrial TV programmes to streaming data via the 4G/5G antenna and router, this combo kit offers complete control and programme options. As the antenna and router are designed specifically for campervan, caravan and motorhome users, the Maxview Roam 5G Combo improves connectivity in remote or rural locations. Plus, as 5G technology continues to be deployed across the UK and Europe, this combo kit ensures you are future ready as technology advances. However, should you find that 5G is not available in your holiday location, then the Roam 5G router will connect to the 4G network and still offer a reliable and fast mobile data connection, keeping you in touch and connected. 

Adjustable TV Booster

In areas of differential signal strength, the Maxview Variable Signal Booster provides adjustable gain control for improving picture image. The wideband UHF and HVF signal receiver provides exceptional reception for DAB radio and Digital TV quality. Two aerial outputs provide flexibility on use and positioning of TV's or radio within your caravan or motorhome.

Easy Installation Combo Kit

The Maxview Roam 5G Combo 5G/WiFi and Aerial kit includes power supplies for both router and signal booster as well as all the standard fixings and brackets required for simple installation. For increased flexibility and ease of use, the router can be operating the router is simple with the free smartphone application available for Android and iOS compatible phones. The app allows remote monitoring of data usage, current status and connection settings as well as password control and other key settings. 

Maxview Roam 5G Combo key features:

  • Compact 5G antenna with inbuilt omni-directional TV aerial
  • Choice of white or grey aerial
  • 5G router with dual SIM ports
  • Aluminium router casing with anti-vibration mounting
  • 5 ethernet ports for stable wired laptop, smartv or device connection
  • Compatible with 5G technology (when used a suitable SIM card)
  • Connectivity to existing WiFi network when in range saving mobile data
  • Runs on 12v
  • Variable Signal Booster for improved TV viewing

  • 4G/5G WiFi router

Mopeka Pro Gas Cylinder Bluetooth Level Sensor with Magnet for Steel Gas Bottles

The Mopeka Pro Gas Cylinder Bluetooth Level Sensor is the perfect way to monitor the level of your gas cylinder remotely. With its easy-to-install magnetic design, it can be attached to any steel gas bottle in seconds. Once installed, Simply download the free Mopeka Check app on your smartphone or tablet, and you'll have real-time updates via Bluetooth on how much gas you have left.

Whether you're camping, grilling, or using your gas stove at home, the Mopeka Pro Gas Cylinder Bluetooth Level Sensor can help you stay prepared. Never be caught off guard again!

Features:

  • Bluetooth connectivity for remote monitoring
  • Easy-to-install magnetic design
  • Suitable for all steel gas bottles
  • Live updates to your smartphone or tablet
  • Low battery indicator

Maxview Alphatronics HD Smart TV For Caravans and Campervans

12v Smart TV in a Range of Sizes

Available in a choice of three screen sizes, the Maxview Smart HD TV provides clear picture quality entertainment perfect for campervan and caravan users. Supplied with a 12v cigarette adapter and 240V AC PSU, these Smart TVs have flexible power options enabling you to remain entertained whether running from your 12v leisure battery or 240V mains hook-up on a commercial site or inverter. Three practical, caravan friendly screen sizes make up the Maxview K-Line+ series TVs, so picking the optimum size for your caravan or campervan is easy. All three screens offer a generous 178° viewing angle, perfect for family TV watching.

Inbuilt Terrestrial TV Receiver

When connected to a suitable TV aerial, and depending upon signal reception, the Maxview Alphatronics K-Line+ TVs will provide access to all standard terrestrial channels and programmes, thanks to the built-in triple DVB tuner. For added flexibility, the K-Line+ series has dual USB ports and 2 HDMI inputs for connecting secondary devices like games consoles, laptops or DVD players. In addition to these standard input ports, the K-Line+ range of caravan and campervan TVs provide WiFi and Bluetooth connectivity. For improved control, the K-Line+ TVs are supplied with two handheld remote control units, one for general TV operation and the second as a dedicated Smart TV control.

Slimline TV Design

Due to the lightweight design and removable stand, these Smart TVs can easily be mounted using a suitable VESA bracket, for optimum viewing position and easy storage. Please note, depending upon the bracket type, it may be recommended to remove TVs from brackets prior to travel.

Available streaming services include:

  • Netflix
  • Amazon Prime
  • Disney+
  • BBC iPlayer
  • Now TV
  • ITV X and many more

  • Full HD on 22" and 24" Models - HD Ready 720p on 19" model
  • Built-in triple tuners - DVB-T2, DVB-C, DVB-S/S2
  • Wi-Fi 2.4 and 5Ghz built-in

  • 7 day EPG programme guide

  • Shock and vibration tested 
  • CI socket for access for pay TV’s

Product Name: Maxview Quick Release Triple Arm Wall TV Bracket
Product Description:
Maxview Quick Release Triple Arm TV Bracket

Multi Arm Option Bracket

A unique feature of this TV wall bracket is the ability to change the number of bracket arms based upon the needs of your caravan or campervan layout. Simply add or remove the three bracket arms to achieve the optimum viewing angle and position. The bracket is suitable for TV screen sizes between 13" to 40" with a maximum weight of 15kg. The VESA mounting bracket also has a quick release fitting for easy removal to aid storage or security.

Adjustable bracket

Obtaining that perfect viewing angle for evening of comfy caravan TV viewing is easily achieved with the brackets tilt and swivel adjustments. Independent movement of the tilt angle and swivel rotation between 180° help make viewing as perfect as possible. However, this may be limited by the TV screen size and location. 

Triple Arm TV Bracket Features:

  • Matt black aluminium frame
  • Suitable for screen size between 13" to 40"
  • Removable arms for optimum fit
  • Included transit lock to prevent arm movement
  • Detachable VESA plate for quick TV removal
  • Swivel adjustment up to 180° (depending upon screen size and location)
  • Tilt adjustment
  • VESA compliant for 75mm or 200mm mounts
  • Clips for cable management
  • Maximum supported weight 15kg

Product Name: Maxview  SL-Line+ Smart HD TV and DVD - 12v 240v
Product Description:
Maxview Alphatronics SL-Line+ HD Smart TV With DVD For Caravans and Motorhomes

12v Smart TV With Combined DVD Player

Designed for caravans and motorhomes, these Maxview SL-Line+ HD TVs and DVD combined units provide a neat and compact entertain centre. With screen sizes upto 32 inches, these 12v/240V TVs are perfect for caravans and motorhome users looking for increased size and choice of digital TV tuner and DVD player in one. Full HD quality images are available in the sizes 22" to 32", HD 720p in the 19" model, and provide picture perfect clear TV entertainment and are powered via a cigarette connection for 12v DC use or 240V AC power adapter when on electrical hook-up. All screen sizes offer a family friendly wide screen 16:9 display and with a 178° wide viewing angle, make it easy to settle in for a movie night or watching your favourite programmes. 

Inbuilt DVD Player and Terrestrial TV Receiver

With the triple tuner providing Terrestrial Freeview channels, Freesat and Free To Air satellite system connectivity, the SL-Line+ TVs from Maxview allow you to stay up to date with your favourite programmes, news channels or box sets. However, if you want to watch something on DVD, the in-built player provides added flexibility in one complete package.

Connectivity Options

With a suitable TV aerial and  in a signal reception area, the Maxview Alphatronics SL-Line+ TVs provide all standard terrestrial channels and programmes you would expcect, thanks to the built-in triple DVB tuner. Connecting additional devices is straight forward with two USB ports and dual HDMI inputs for games consoles or laptops. WiFi and Bluetooth connectivity comes as standard. For complete control over the SL-Line+ TVs, there are three remote controls are included. One solely for DVD operation, one with dedicated smart TV capabilities and a general TV remote.

Mountable TV Design

Making the most of the interior space of your motorhome or caravan is key to comfortable living and the Maxview TVs can be wall mounted for convenient viewing and to maximise the space when stored. With a removable stand and lightweight construction, the Maxview Alphatronics smart HD TVs are a stylish addition to your motorhome when mounted on a suitable bracket. Please note, depending upon the bracket type used, it may be recommended to remove TVs from brackets prior to travel.

Available streaming services include:

  • Netflix
  • Amazon Prime
  • Disney+
  • BBC iPlayer
  • Now TV
  • ITV X and many more

  • HD Ready 720p on 19" model

Portable Outdoor Induction Cooker - Single and Double

The Outdoor Revolution Induction Hob is the safer cooking alternative to traditional gas cookers. The single and double induction cooker features temperature control, overheat protection and timer making it the ideal solution for camping, campervans and motorhomes. In all there are ten/six (single/double) functions on the hob making it extremely versatile. The top is very easy to keep clean, and the non-slip feet add extra support. Includes UK to EU plug socket converter

Compatible with refillable gas bottle setups for Motorhomes, Campervans, and other recreational vehicles the DREHIMEISTER refillable LPG gas bottle adapter set provides a convenient solution to refilling your LPG when travelling abroad.

The set includes a convenient carrying case for easy storage and transport, so you can always have it with you when you need it. Not suitable for direct connection to Safefil bottles
