Product Description:
Introducing the AMC12-12-30 12 volt Battery to Battery Charger (b2b Charger)

Unveiling the AMC12-12-30 - A Versatile 12v b2b Charger

Discover the AMC12-12-30, also known as a B2B charger, designed for vehicles equipped with a 12V electrical system. This powerhouse is engineered to charge nominal 12V battery packs efficiently. Employing cutting-edge technology, this 12 volt battery to battery charger harmonises with various features including Ignition control, Constant Voltage Alternators, Euro 5 & 6 engines, STOP/START, Smart Alternator charging systems, and vehicles providing Regenerative Braking capabilities (such as Mercedes Benz Blue Efficiency Vehicles, VW Blue Motion Vehicles, Ford ECOnetic vehicles, Vauxhall ecoFlex vehicles, among others). With a charging capacity of 30A, this b2b charger can charge battery packs of up to 300Ahr, ensuring robust performance.

Versatile Compatibility and Robust Performance

Operating within a voltage range of 9-30V, this 12 volt B2B charger accommodates extended cable runs and copes with significant fluctuations in input voltages. Providing protective measures against current overload and overheating, this b2b charger features an automatic reset for added safety and convenience. The built-in software optimises the battery charging cycle, adaptable to various lead acid battery types such as Gel and AGM. Moreover, it offers reprogramming flexibility to align with specific battery types or custom requirements via the Ablemail Software Interface (ASI).

Enhanced Functionality and Customisability

For extended monitoring capabilities, an optional Interface Card is available, providing remote output voltage monitoring for secondary batteries positioned at a distance from the charger. Additionally, it includes Battery Temperature monitoring, ideal for extreme operating conditions, be it scorching heat or freezing cold. This  can also be programmed to charge Lithium batteries, expanding its compatibility.

Rugged Construction for Diverse Environments

Housed in an aluminium extruded case, this charger can be filled with resin, rendering it suitable for operation in harsh environments. Offering multiple connection options, it can be tailored to specific needs with the Ablemail Mechanical Options.

Tailored Solutions and Technical Support

As part of an extensive product range, if the specifications of the AMC12-12-30 12 volt b2b charger do not precisely align with your requirements, our technical department is available to explore and address your specific needs. Feel free to contact us for tailored solutions.

Experience the AMC12-12-30 B2B charger - your solution for reliable, adaptable, and high-performance 12 volt b2b battery charging in diverse automotive settings.

Product Description:
Fiamma Clean Step Cover

Clean Step Doormat

Keep carpets, mats and flooring of your caravan or motorhome cleaner for longer with the Fiamma Clean Step Cover. Prevent sand, mud, water and stones from being walked into motorhome or caravan and damaging the interior of your vehicle. 

Easy Install Design

The Clean Step doormat cover is simple to install with a choice of installation holes and a pair of retainer springs. With a wrap around design, hardwearing material and robust springs, the Fiamma Clean Step is simply placed on the step, springs attached to keep in place. This makes for easy installation and removal for cleaning.

Standard Sized Cover

The step cover is compatible with most caravan and motorhome single or double steps available on the market. They can also be installed to manual or electric steps due top the simple yet effective design.

Fiamma Clean Step Specifications

  • Easy install design
  • Strong material and robust spring attachments
  • Available in Green or Black
  • Compatible with most single or double caravan or motorhome steps
  • Fits manual or electric steps
  • Weight: 0.2kg

Product Name: Maxview  SLA-Line+ Smart HD TV, DVD And Sound Bar - 12v 240v
Product Description:
Maxview Alphatronics SLA-Line+ HD Smart TV And DVD Combo With Integrated Sound Bar

A 12v Smart TV/DVD Player With Improved Sound

Specifically designed for campervans, caravans and motorhomes, the Maxview SLA-Line+ models feature the same high picture quality picture of the other Maxview Alphatronics range of Smart TV's with the added bonus of enhanced audio output with the in-buiilt sound bar. Available in three screen sizes, these Smart TVs are perfect for caravans and motorhome users that are looking for increased audio sound quality. Each of the SLA-Line+ models are still feature packed including triple tuner with DVD player, Smart TV options with WiFi connectivity.

HD Quality Picture Image

Great picture quality is all but guaranteed with a full HD 16:9 ratio screen image meaning your TV entertainment within your motorhome or caravan will not be affected. Powered via a cigarette connection for 12v DC or 240V AC power adapter, keeping up to date with your favourite TV programmes, streaming the latest boxsets or blockbuster films are all possible with the Maxview SLA-Line+ TV. A generous 178° screen viewing angle make family viewing in your caravan or motorhome more comfortable. 

Inbuilt DVD Player, Terrestrial TV Receiver and Sound Bar

The triple tuner TV receiver provides access to Terrestrial Freeview channels, Freesat and Free To Air satellite channels. Combined with the DVD player and Sound Bar, the TV provides a complete entertainment package. The SLA-Line+ TV models also have full connectivity options including HDMI, USB, Bluetooth and WiFi connections.

Full Remote Control

For complete control over the TV, DVD and Sound Bar, the SLA-Line+ TVs comes with three separate remote controls. The Smart TV control also incorporates the Magic Remote for voice control and Air-Mouse technology for gesture and scroll functionality for improved flexibility.

TV Bracket Compatible

For the best possible viewing, the Maxview SLA-Line+ TVs can be mounted to a suitable wall bracket for easy adjusting and storage. With a removable stand and lightweight construction, the Maxview Smart TV is a great addition to your motorhome interior when mounted on a suitable wall bracket. Please note, depending upon the bracket type used, it may be recommended to remove TVs from brackets prior to travel.

Product Description:
CAMPKO 2nd Bottle Add-On Kit

The CAMPKO Second Bottle Add-On Kit is the perfect way to add a second refillable LPG gas bottle to your existing setup. This add-on kit includes everything you need to connect your two refillable LPG gas bottles, including a 0.5m filling hose, a straight filling nozzle, a 90° filling nozzle, and a T-piece. Either a direct refuelling adapter or a filling hose with filling nozzle can be connected to the T-piece.

This add-on kit is compatible with all refillable gas cylinders with a G 3/4 UNF connection. It is also easy to install, so you can be up and running in minutes.

Features:

  • Connect two refillable gas cylinders with a G 3/4 UNF connection
  • Includes a 0.5m filling hose, a straight filling nozzle, a 90° filling nozzle, and a T-piece
  • Easy to install

Benefits:

  • Save money by refilling your own bottles
  • Be prepared for emergencies with a backup gas supply

Product Description:
CAMPKO LPG Gas Filter for Campervan, Caravan & Motorhome

Protect your campervan, motorhome or caravan's gas system with the CAMPKO LPG Gas Filter. This filter removes contaminants from the gas, including aerosols that can build up in the gas regulator, pipes, and valves of your appliances. This can lead to malfunctions and even safety hazards. This filter is designed to fit directly onto the regulator the pigtail will screw onto the other end.

The CAMPKO LPG gas filter is easy to install and can be used with all gas pressure regulators that have an external thread M20 x 1.5 (G. 13) on the inlet side. The filter is made of a high-quality borosilicate microglass fiber and is housed in a robust aluminum casing.

The replaceable filter insert should be replaced every two years at the latest, depending on use.

Features:

  • Removes contaminants from LPG gas, including aerosols
  • Protects gas regulators, pipes, and valves from malfunctions and safety hazards
  • Easy to install - fitted between the pigtail and the regulator
  • Compatible with all gas pressure regulators that have an external thread M20 x 1.5 (G. 13) on the inlet side

Benefits:

  • Extends the life of your gas appliances
  • Improves safety and reliability
  • Peace of mind knowing that your gas system is protected

Technical Specification:

Gas type LPG propane/butane

Filter input external thread M20x1.5 (G.36 )

Filter output Nut M20x1.5 (G.36)

Operating pressure up to 30.4 bar

Working temperature -20° to 125°

Dimensions approx. mm (H x W x D) 5 x 7.5 x 5.5 cm

Weight (incl. Filter insert) 297 g

Certification ECE 67 R01, TAPPI T251, TAPPI T410, TAPPI T403, ASTM E1294, ISO 16889, DIN 53,887

How to Recognize Contaminated Gas

A yellow-tipped flame on your gas burner is a sign of incomplete combustion. This can be caused by a variety of factors, including:

  • Moisture in the gas line
  • Dirt or debris in the gas line
  • Contaminants from the LPG production process

If you see a yellow-tipped flame, it is important to turn off the gas immediately and have the problem diagnosed by a qualified technician.
Product Warranty: The CAMPKO range of products come with a 12 Month manufacturer warranty.

Product Description:
Maxview Roam Bracket Fixing Kit

Roof Mounting Bracket For Roam and Roam Campervan Router Antennas

The Roam Bracket Fixing Kit provides unparalleled flexibility to mount your Maxview Roam antenna anywhere along the roof of your campervan, motorhome or caravan. The bracket enables router positioning for optimal signal reception and uninterrupted Wi-Fi connectivity. The innovative design eliminates the need to enter cables directly below the router antenna, allowing you to route them to your preferred location using the supplied extension cables and cable entry cover. Alternatively, you can utilize an existing cable entry for a seamless installation.

Choose the correct bracket type for either the circular Roam or Roam Campervan Antenna version from the dropdown list above.

Roam Antenna Install Flexibility

With the Maxview Roam Bracket, you can optimize the placement of your router antenna, ensuring that it receives the strongest possible signal and provides you with the best possible connectivity experience. The bracket fixing kit also enables easy installation around roof mounted devices such as solar panels, roof light, or storage racks. Whether you need to mount the antenna to your campervan or motorhome, or along the roof space of your boat, the Roam Router Bracket Kit offers the flexibility and convenience needed of an easy installation option.

Please Note - Recommended for 800mm Roam Campervan cable lengths only.

Maxview Roam/Roam Campervan Bracket Fixing Kit Features

  • Versatile Mounting Options - Mount your antenna anywhere on your roof, regardless of vehicle type or structural limitations.
  • Convenient Cable Routing - Route the cables to your preferred location without worrying about accessing them beneath the antenna.
  • Compatible with Existing Cable Entries - Integrate the antenna seamlessly with your existing cable infrastructure.
  • Durable Construction - Crafted from high-quality materials for long-lasting performance and resistance to harsh weather conditions.
  • Easy Installation - Straightforward installation process that doesn't require complex modifications or specialized tools.
  • All required fittings included

Maxview Roam Bracket Fixing Kit Contents

  • Antenna Roof Bracket
  • Cable Entry Cover
  • 2m Extension Cables
  • Bracket Fixing Screws
  • Cable Clips
  • Installation Instructions

Installation Manual

Product Name: Outdoor Revolution Cayman Air Drive Away Awning
Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Cayman Air Drive Away Awning

Experience Hassle-Free Camping with the Outdoor Revolution Cayman Air Awning

The Outdoor Revolution Cayman Air is a lightweight, single-point inflation family drive-away awning that is perfect for those who want a quick and easy setup. It is now available in three ergonomic cowl height options to fit a wide variety of campervans and motorhomes. The unique design of the Cayman Air means that it is one of the most versatile drive-away awnings on the market, offering access from all sides of the awning through the large roll back doors.

Front Facing Drive Away Awning Design

With the large awning front door facing the same direction as your motorhome or campervan, it means that having the best possible views from your vehicle and awning is achievable. Watching the sun rise or set from your awning whilst still maintaining your privacy from other site guests is added bonus. The eyebrow style canopy at the front also provides some additional protection from the elements should the weather change for the worst. 

Outdoor Revolution Cayman Air Drive Away Awning Features

  • Toggle privacy blinds
  • Colour coded guylines
  • Crystal clear PVC windows
  • Hydrostatic head of 3000mm
  • Roof ventilation with Velcro storm cover
  • Adjustable webbing peg system for best fit
  • Kador connection with 4mm & 6mm connectors
  • 120HDE high density all-weather lightweight fabric
  • Removable rear door compatible with optional annexe
  • Single inflation dura tech welded Oxygen Air Frame system
  • Available in 3 different rail connection heights - low/mid/high
  • Integrated eyebrow canopy with fibre glass pole for added shelter
  • Drive away awning includes manual air pump, pegs and carry bag
  • Front & side doors can zip back and include a mesh ventilation panel

  • Packsize: 77 x 45 x 35cm
  • Pitched Dimensions: 300 x 300 (+ 80cm cowl depth) x 220
  • Rail connection length: 250cm
  • Connection Rail Height:

    • Cayman Air Mid: 220cm - 255cm
    • Cayman Air High: 255cm - 305cm

Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Cayman Driveaway Awning Annexe

Create Extra Space With The Cayman Annexe

Whether you need some additional space for storage of your camping equipment or require an extra bedroom area for guests to sleep in, the latest Outdoor Revolution Cayman Annexe is a great addition to your Cayman Drive Away Awning. Attaching to the rear of the awning, this annex features a spacious 2-berth sleeping area, enhanced by 'Twilight' micro-polyester material which keeps the bedroom dark on bright mornings. This easy to set up annexe, with a single durable yet lightweight fiberglass pole, can accommodate up to 2 adults in comfort. The internal sewn-in groundsheet allows for the removal of the inner tent, transforming the annexe into extra storage or living space as desired.

Simple Sturdy Single Pole Annex Design

Once attached to the rear awning door, the Cayman Annexe creates a rugged area thanks to the single pole construction and strong guylines and webbing pegging points. The fibreglass pole provides a generous usable height without being too exposed to wind. The awning also has good air flow with the large phoenix ventilation panel, to help keep condensation to a minimum.

Outdoor Revolution Cayman Annex Features

  • 120HDE Hex high density all weather lightweight fabric
  • Hydrostatic head 3000mm
  • Lightweight yet robust Dura Tech fibreglass poled frame
  • Side Phoenix mesh ventilation panel with external roll up cover
  • Includes 2 berth sleeping inner tent
  • Hi vis guylines with quick adjusters

Cayman Annexe Specifications

  • Weight: 4.9kg
  • Packsize: 72cm x 33cm x 17cm
  • Footprint: 200 x 220cm

Product Name: Outdoor Revolution Cayman Poled Drive Away Awning
Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Cayman Poled Campervan Or Motorhome Drive Away Awning

Discontinued - replaced by Cayman DT 

With a strong, lightweight fibreglass pole and sleeve construction, the Cayman Poled driveaway awning is a great spacious driveaway awning, perfect for long weekends away or extended family holidays in the sun. With large roll back doors on all sides, the Cayman Poled Awning allows excellent ventilation and flexibility.  With Crystal Clear Windows, even rolling the doors shut still allows plenty of light to come in to the awning. With three versions available with connection heights of between 180cm to 305cm, finding the correct model of Cayman Poled Driveaway Awning for your campervan or motorhome is easy.

Optional Bedroom Annex For More Space

The new Cayman Poled drive away awning also provides the option to attach a Bedroom Annex at the back, ensuring that your main living space remains unaffected when adding sleeping for two adults. With a 'fold-flat' sewn-in groundsheet for improved accessibility, lightweight yet waterproof out fabric and strong guylines and webbing straps, this motorhome or campervan drive away is practical and effective. Ventilation through mesh fly screen door panels and roof venting ensure that the interior of the awning is kept cool when the temperature rises. The spacious footprint is excellent for touring small families, couples, or independent adventurers seeking additional a usable space alongside their van without breaking the bank.

Easy Pitch Front Facing Drive Away Awning

One of the key features to this drive away awning is that the main front door faces the same direction as your motorhome or campervan so that sitting in your awning gives you the same great views you have from your vehicle. The front facing awning also provides additional privacy from your neighbours when pitched on site. 

Outdoor Revolution Cayman Poled Drive Away Awning Features

  • 120HDE high density all-weather lightweight fabric
  • Waterproof with a hydrostatic head of 3000mm
  • Available in 3 different rail connection heights - low/mid/high
  • Front & side doors roll back

  • Integrated eyebrow canopy with fibreglass pole for added shelter
  • Crystal clear PVC windows

Product Name: Outdoor Revolution Cayman Air Dura-tread Carpet
Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Cayman Air Dura-tread Awning Carpet

Made To Measure Carpet

Experience camping with an added luxurious twist thanks to the lightweight and super-soft Dura-tread awning carpet. Designed to fit the Cayman Air/Poled drive away awning, the Dura-Thread Carpet is an essential optional addition that helps create a more comfortable and snug environment. Boasting a super-soft upper texture underfoot and a damp proof protection underneath, this carpet is specifically designed to compliment the colours of the Cayman range of drive away awnings.

Durable and Tough

The Dura-tread carpet serves as a practical solution to adding additional comfort and warmth underfoot, as well as safeguarding the groundsheet of your tent or awning from potential damage caused by furniture, dog claws, and accidental spills. The Dura-thread carpet also makes cleaning up easier and can reduce dirt, mud or stones being walked in to your motorhome or campervan. 

Insulative Properties

Featuring a resilient, hardwearing backing with insulation properties, it not only shields against cold and damp, but also provides a warm and soft area within your living space of your awning. Versatile and robust, this carpet comes neatly packed in a convenient carry bag, allowing for compact storage and effortless portability.

Outdoor Revolution Cayman Air Dura-tread Carpet Features:

  • Prevents damp and water ingression from below
  • Additional groundsheet protection
  • Insulative fabric provides warmth underfoot
  • Carry bag included
  • Sized specifically for Cayman Air/Cayman Poled Drive Away Awnings

Fiamma Awning Peg Kit

Fiamma Peg Set For Securing Awnings and Mats 

Fiamma have produced a robust set of screw pegs designed for awnings, enclosures, and mats, offering exceptional durability. These pegs are both sturdy and user-friendly, constructed from resilient UV-resistant plastic. Easily anchor them into the ground manually using the included special key or connect them to an electric screwdriver for added convenience. Crafted with a innovative spiral design, these pegs are lighter than traditional metal ones while providing increased resistance. Particularly suitable for soft and sandy grounds, the spiral construction offers superior performance. Removal is easy, simply unscrew them with minimum effort.

Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Cayman Awning Footprint

Add comfort and protection to your Cayman Awning

Introducing the robust Outdoor Revolution Stone Protection Footprint Groundsheet, an excellent optional addition for enhanced defence against water ingress, sharp rocks, and tough terrain. With an impressive hydrostatic head of 10,000mm², this heavy-duty groundsheet is made for protecting your awning and will help keep it in the best possible condition. Beyond protecting the awning sewn-in groundsheet from dirt accumulation, this groundsheet boasts rotproof properties, ensuring easy maintenance after each use.

Durable and Tough Awning Groundsheet

Crafted to a substantial thickness and with a robust construction, it not only provides added comfort for a restful night's sleep, should the awning be used as a sleeping area, but also ensures improves underfoot comfort within the internal living space. Equipped with strategically placed eyelets in each corner, the groundsheet can be securely anchored using your own choice of ground pegs. With a footprint dimension of 290 x 290cm, this makes it perfect for Outdoor Revolution Cayman Air or Poled Driveaway Awnings.

Outdoor Revolution Cayman Awning Footprint Groundsheet Features:

  • Tough, robust, rot-proof construction
  • Hydrostatic Head Rating of 10,000mm²
  • Offers protection from mud, water ingression, sharp rocks or stones

Product Name: EVOmatic Flush Door Catch for Campervan and Motorhome Triple Pack
Product Description:
EVOmatic Flush Door Catches

Designed for Leisure Vehicles

Designed by Evomotion Design EVOmatic Flush Door Catches have a self-locking mechanism specifically designed for use in caravans, motorhomes and other leisure vehicles. Offering a modern design with practical features that enhance the functionality and aesthetics of your vehicle.

Key Features

  • Self-locking: The EvoMatic flush door catch automatically locks upon closing the door, providing a secure and rattle-free closure.
  • Flush design: The catch sits flush with the surface of the door and frame, creating a clean and streamlined look.
  • Adjustable fit: EvoMatic Flush Door Catches allows for fine-tuning of the latching mechanism, ensuring a snug fit and smooth operation.
  • Modern design: Its leek and contemporary design complements the modern aesthetics of drawers and doors for most campervans, caravans, boats, and motorhomes.

Additional Points to Consider

  • Screws: Screws are not included with the Evo catches and need to be purchased separately. The required screw length depends on the thickness of your door and frame. Suitable for 12mm – 18mm thickness furniture board
  • Accessibility: The newer versions of the Evo catch no longer have the rear finger pull, meaning it can only be opened from the outside.
  • Usage: While primarily designed for leisure and marine applications, Evo catches can potentially be used in other applications where a flush-mounted, self-locking mechanism is desired.
Product Availability: Door and drawer catches are sent next working day delivery

Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Cayman Cuda F/G Poled Campervan Drive Away Awning

Cayman Cuda Poled Drive Away Awning

This robust awning, performs perfectly alongside most campervans or low height motorhomes. With a high density outer fabric providing a weatherproof and hardwearing shell, this drive away awning is both lightweight and strong making it ideal for short weekends away, touring holidays or extended trips where some extra storage is required. A fully sewn-in groundsheet helps to keep water and dirt away, and the Crystal Clear windows let in plenty of light and come complete with toggled curtains to provide privacy when needed.

The Cayman Cuds XL F/G is based on the Cayman Cuda but has an extra deep main living area.

Ventilated Utility Drive Away Awning 

A single rear access tunnel door provides easy access to the motorhome or campervan without needing to walk through the driveaway awning. A large front door opens the awning up to improve your view whilst the side mesh window and roof ventilation system allows warm air to escape during the hot summer months, improving comfort.

  • Crystal clear PVC windows with toggle privacy blinds
  • Fully sewn-in groundsheet with fold down access

Product Description:
Outwell ECO Ace Cool Box 24L 12V/230V

Elevate your outdoor adventures with the Outwell Eco Ace 24L, the versatile cool box that keeps your food and drinks perfectly chilled (18°C below ambient!) or pleasantly warm, all while embracing eco-conscious technology. Perfect for camping, picnics, bbq's, hikes and more; the Outwell ECO Ace cool box is the perfect outdoor companion for all year round.

Features:

Flexibility is key to any adventure. The Outwell Eco Ace 24L seamlessly adapts to your needs, offering both 12V and 230V compatibility. Plug it into your car's cigarette lighter for on-the-road chills, or use any standard wall outlet for effortless home or office refreshment. No limitations, just pure cooling satisfaction wherever you find yourself.

The Eco Ace 24L delivers a powerful chill, providing cooling 18°C below the outside air temperature. That means perfectly frosty beverages and perfectly chilled snacks, even on the hottest days, and thanks to the antimicrobial storage compartment which actively fights harmful bacteria, the Eco Ace 24L keeps your snacks and drinks safe and healthy while they stay cool.

The Outwell Eco Ace 24L isn't just about instant chills; it's about lasting results. High-density polyfoam insulation forms a powerful barrier, keeping your food and drinks at their ideal temperature for longer. But why settle for just a cooler when with the ECO Ace 24L you can have more? The Outwell Eco Ace 24L also doubles as a handy heater as well with its included heating function, ensuring you have perfect temperature control no matter the season. Enjoy warm comfort food on brisk autumn days or even keep your coffee toasty on a winter hike.

Benefits:

Eco-Friendly Choice: Energy-efficient operation minimizes your environmental impact.
Effortless Convenience: Dual power, antimicrobial protection, and easy access design provide a stress-free experience.
Ultimate Versatility: Perfect for cooling on hot days, warming on chilly nights, and everything in between.
Durable and Compact: Made for adventure, it's lightweight and built to last.

Technical Specs:

  • Barcode - 5709388143655

  • Capacity - 24L

Product Name: Sanymo Heatek XB Campervan Motorhome Water Heater
Product Description:
Sanymo Heatek XB Water Heater for Caravan and Motorhome

Upgrade your campervan, motorhome or boat with the reliable HEATEK XB range of water heaters and experience the comfort of hot water wherever you go!

This compact and efficient boiler utilises a smart design for quick heating and lasting warmth. The advanced insulated housing ensures minimal heat loss, keeping your water warm for longer periods.

Here's what makes the HEATEK XB Water Heaters stand out:

  • Fast and efficient heating: Enjoy hot water quickly thanks to the high-precision heating element.
  • Long-lasting warmth: Advanced insulation keeps your water warm for hours, even on chilly days.
  • Durable construction: The stainless steel tank is built to withstand the demands of outdoor use and complies with European drinking water regulations.
  • Easy operation: Control the boiler effortlessly with the included wall-mounted panel.
  • Complete package: The XB combi boiler comes with everything you need for installation, including drain taps, hose clamps, mounting materials, and a multilingual manual.
  • Compatible with on demand microswitch operated submersible water pumps

Key Features:

  • The XB-3 & XB-6 share a surprisingly low 300 watt power requirement when running on 230v AC, meaning you can use a smaller inverter and run for longer.
  • The XB-3 is a unique combi boiler and functions on both 230v AC and 12V DC 
  • The XB-10 has a 10L capacity for when you need just that little bit extra and sports a powerful 600W element

  • Heating Time 15°C-70°C: 230V - 38 Minutes // 12V - 57 Minutes

Product Description:
Heatek CF1 Fridge Fan for Absorption Fridges

Enjoy superior cooling for your caravan or motorhome fridge, even in scorching temperatures, with the Heatek CF1 Fridge Fan. This powerful triple fan system efficiently boosts your refrigerator's performance, ensuring your food and drinks stay refreshingly cool, no matter how hot it gets outside.

Heatek CF1 Fridge Fan Features:

Effective Cooling: Triple fans generate a powerful airflow of 66 m3/h, significantly improving your fridge's cooling capacity.
Universal Compatibility: Fits seamlessly behind all types of absorption refrigerators in caravans and motorhomes.
Durable Design: Dustproof and waterproof construction
Easy Installation: Choose from two mounting options and utilize the long power cable for flexible placement.
Quiet Operation: Runs whisper-quiet at just 28 dB(A), ensuring peaceful journeys.
Energy Efficient: Low power consumption of 1.8 W won't drain your battery.

Technical Specifications:

  • Fans: 70 mm (3 pieces)
  • Air flow: 66 m3/h
  • Noise level: 28 dB(A)
  • Input voltage: 12 VDC
  • Power consumption: 0.15 A
  • Power: 1.8 W
  • Dimensions: 249 x 75 x 16 mm
  • Weight: 157 g
